get_line.en: I want to save the world with the mercy of healing.

story.en: Second daughter of Rosvalt, an adviser to the former king of Ezera, Achates joined the Holy Order of the Blue Cross with the wish to save the world through the Goddess's mercy. She has little to do with her older sister, heir to the family name, and seems to be holding some discontent within her heart.

story.en: Faced with an otherworldly threat, Ras renounced his holiness and became Human in order to save Orbis. Now that he understands the true nature of power, he is able to fully utilize those granted to him by Diche and Ilryos as he looks ahead to new adventures.

story.en: An Automatic Doll that is honest at best and arrogant and aggressive at worst. Some people think her language unit and anger control circuit are malfunctioning.

Though it takes the shape of a girl who was once a part of it, its essence is not of life but rather pieces of memories and corrupt energy. As it longs endlessly for new bodies, it now wanders to find a being that can contain it.

story.en: An officer of the Reingar Public Security Club, Azalea is mainly responsible for guarding the library and catching book thieves. Despite being trusted with many leadership duties, she has a history of continuously failing to be appointed to the Student Council.

description.en: A faithful officer with a duty to maintain order
Stabs the enemy with a spear and recovers Health of the caster. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each of provoking and making them unhealable for 2 turns.
Sweeps all enemies with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Speed and Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: If Sezan wishes it, we will go.

story.en: Sezan was once a dark magician, until her body was destroyed in a forbidden summoning ceremony gone awry. Before her soul also perished, her apprentice Baal placed it inside a doll, and together they have embarked on a long journey to return her soul to a Human body.

description.en: A great magician-turned-doll, and her faithful apprentice
Summons an evil spirit to attack two enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict --poison-- for 2 turns.

Summons the Cloud of Darkness to attack **all enemies**, dealing damage proportional to the **number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy**. When the enemy is defeated by this attack, the **cooldown** for Last Requiem is **reset**.
Baal & Sezan attack **all enemies** with Strike Magic, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them --unhealable-- and inflict --decreased Speed-- for 2 turns.
Baal & Sezan attack **all enemies** with Strike Magic, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them --unhealable-- and inflict --decreased Defense-- and --Speed-- for 2 turns.
A cape Baal made for Sezan after she became a doll. Baal is keeping it in his pocket, looking forward to her reaction when she sees it.
Increase damage dealt by Ghost Haunt by 10%.
**Dispels** one buff from **all enemies** when using Last Requiem.
Increases all of Last Requiem's effect chances by 5%.

get_line.en: I don't strive to achieve a greater good. It's a dog-eat-dog world, I kill anyone, no matter if they're good or evil.

story.en: She lost her family and friends in a Gear attack led by That Man. From that point on she walked the path of Asura, obsessed with exacting revenge on That Man. Tough and decisive, she boasts fighting power that can rival even that of a Gear.

description.en: A one-armed, one-eyed samurai dreaming of revenge
Attacks the enemy repeatedly, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two --bleeding effects-- for 2 turns. A critical hit will **reduce the caster's skill cooldowns** by 1 turn.
Attacks the enemy with expert swordsmanship, with a {{variable}} chance each of inflicting three --bleeding-- effects for 2 turns. One bleeding effect **ignores Effect Resistance**.

Attacks the enemy with expert swordsmanship, with a {{variable}} chance each of inflicting three --bleeding-- effects for 2 turns. One bleeding effect **ignores Effect Resistance**. A critical hit will grant an **extra turn**.
Delivers a deadly blow, detonating any --bleeding-- effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn. A critical hit **increases the Combat Readiness** of all allies by {{variable}}.

get_line.en: I wondered when you'd call.

story.en: Leader of one of the six biggest merchant guilds in Savara, Basar is a seller of poisons and explosives. A genius of business, at a young age he has gained enough power to compare with the great Afih Merchant Guild.

description.en: A genius holding sway over the economy of an entire continent
Attacks with wind magic.Â When the caster is debuffed, has a {{variable}} chance to **transfer** one debuff from the caster to the enemy and inflict a random debuff for 2 turns.
Attacks **all enemies** by releasing a hot sand hurricane, with a {{variable}} chance each to --decrease Hit Chance-- and --Attack-- for 2 turns.
Attacks **all enemies** with sand magic, **dispelling all buffs** and **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 30%.
Attacks **all enemies** with sand magic, **dispelling all buffs** and making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns, before **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 30%.
After trying on some newly imported clothes for his shop, Basar fell in love with their elaborate, romantic design so much he decided to keep them for himself.

get_line.en: My name is Bask Royceman, an escort of the Order of the Sword. I look forward to working with you.

story.en: With no particular religious faith, and wishing solely to become stronger, he joined the Order of the Sword. His only goal is to have his name remembered by future generations as a powerful knight and he cannot understand anyone who dies in the service of faith or personal beliefs.

description.en: An impious knight of the Order of the Sword
Slashes with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks with a shield, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns.
Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns, before granting a barrier to the caster for 3 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: A world in which only the strong survive...? I like that.

story.en: Batisse gained incredible power after using his teacher, Hataan, and other companions to obtain the Fighter's Mask. Intoxicated by that power, he murdered them all except for Hataan and disappeared. As time passed, the power the mask gave him grew stronger, but in return, his sense of self is becoming increasingly blurred.

description.en: A tragic fighter craving power

Hits the enemy in the face. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, activates Rock Smash as an extra attack.
Rock Smash: Attacks all enemies. This attack receives effects that are applied to the basic skill.

soul_description.en: Activates Rock Smash even when used against enemy without decreased Attack.

description.en: At the start of the turn, has a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy with the highest Combat Readiness for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 1 turn.
Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: You are a vital part of this city's development. That is why I've come all the way here to meet you in person.

story.en: An Al that was created to develop the city of Politia and keep it in tip-top condition. She looks like Politis and is dedicated to benevolently leading its citizens. The citizens of Polita trust her decisions and some of them even worship her.

description.en: An Al built to manage the city for all eternity

Attacks **all enemies** with a ray, with a {{variable}} chance to **dispel one buff**. When used on the caster's turn, has a 35% chance to activate Incursion as an **extra attack**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
Incursion: Attacks **all enemies**, --decreasing Speed-- and --Hit Chance-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

soul_description.en: Increases chance to activate Incursion to 100%.

description.en: **Decreases the amount of Soul acquired** by the enemy by 100%. At the start of the turn, has a {{variable}} chance to grant a ++random buff++ to the caster for 1 turn.

Attacks **all enemies** with the power of duties, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by a random amount between 10% and 30% and --provokes-- for 1 turn. ++Increases Defense++ of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Attacks **all enemies** with the power of duties, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by a random amount between 20% and 40% and --provokes-- for 1 turn. ++Increases Defense++ of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you.

story.en: Daughter of a noble Ezeran family, Bellona ran away from home, refusing to be forced into an arranged marriage. After joining the Phantom CIC she appears to be much more satisfied with her new life, where she can fight as many strong enemies as she likes and hone her skills.

description.en: A noble lady of Ezera yearning for freedom
Attacks the enemy with a fan, dealing damage proportional to the **enemy's max Health**. When the caster's stacked Focus is 5 or more, consumes all Focus and **activates Razorwind Fan**.
Attacks **all enemies** by waving a fan. Damage dealt **increases with more enemies**.
Attacks **all enemies** by waving a fan. Damage dealt **increases with more enemies**. Grants the caster ++immunity++ for 1 turn after attacking.

Attacks **all enemies** by creating a powerful gust of wind, with a {{variable}} chance toÂ --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. Effect chance increases by 20% when Razorwind Fan is triggered by Windbreak Fan.
A beautiful brooch made by the world's greatest artisan using only the highest-grade materials.
**Dispels one buff** each from all enemies when using Butterfly Fan.
Increases chance to --decrease Defense-- by 20% when using Razorwmd Fan.
**Decreases Combat Readiness** of all enemies by 15% when using Razorwrnd Fan.

get_line.en: I'm Romann Barelit, Knight Commander of Lefundos. Hopefully we can get along well.

story.en: Though he treats everyone with gentleness and kindness, he won't hesitate to do anything for his friend Ervalen, no matter how cruel. To him, Schniel is nothing more than a troublemaker, while Ervalen is a trustworthy liege deserving of unconditional loyalty.

description.en: Knight Commander of Lefundos who is kind to everyone

Attacks the enemy with concentrated mana, before a 35% chance to activate Mana Burst. Effect chance is doubled when the target is silenced.
Mana Burst: Attacks all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by a random amount between 15% and 50%.
Reduces the effect of decreased Combat Readiness debuffs inflicted on the caster by {{variable}}.
Attacks all enemies with condensed mana, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with condensed mana, dispelling two buffs, before a {{variable}} chance to silence for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Experience the power of Malicus, the Lord of Fire.

story.en: Originally far from what anyone would consider a normal Human, he is now a completely normal upstanding member of society. Every word out of his mouth is considerate and he has impeccable manners.

description.en: A weird cook of the Wild Dog Company who became normal
Attacks an enemy with a sharp dagger, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, before healing the ally with the lowest Health. A critical hit activates Punishment against a random enemy. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Heals an ally and the caster with sacred power, granting invincibility for 1 turn and increasing Attack for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: Extends the duration of Sacred Power granted to the caster by 1 turn and grants an extra turn.

get_line.en: I will show you the power of the enchanted blade.

story.en: Karin is embroiled in an endless battle against the will of a cursed magical sword, compelled by its power to cause trouble. Though aggressive and cold-hearted while possessed by the sword, she sometimes escapes from the control of it and shows an unexpected side.

description.en: The wielder of a magical blade thirsty for blood
Quickly strikes the enemy with a sword, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50% when the enemy is defeated.
As Health decreases, Attack, Defense, and Speed increase.
Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50% when an enemy is defeated.
Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Grants the caster an extra turn when an enemy is defeated.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you, my name is Haste Lenox. I don't usually speak with the lower classes, but I'll make an exception for you.

story.en: Sole heir of the strongest among all Vampires, he was separated from his father following an attack by a Human mob and found himself alone in a strange land. He deeply respects his father and misses him dearly.

description.en: An arrogant young man of noble blood
Attacks by swinging a scythe, dispelling one buff.
Attacks by swinging a scythe, dispelling one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
When an enemy is revived, grants all allies a barrier and immunity for 1 turn and resets the cooldown of Moon Slash. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Attacks with a scythe, recovering Health of all allies. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the caster's max Health. Decreases damage suffered by allies by 10% when this skill is available. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

get_line.en: Nana wants to make a huuuuuge explosion! And! So! I want you to help Nana!

story.en: An Automatic Doll who specializes in flight and bombs. Where Kanna soars, chaos follows. She's unhappy with Laika, who is just holding her back by saying that bombing should only be used as a last resort.

description.en: A sweet and violent angel of the battlefield
Rapidly fires to **attack two enemies**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's Speed**.

When Full Bombardment! is available at the start of the turn, takes a Shelling Stance. When Full Bombardment! is unavailable at the end of the turn, takes a Striking Stance. Can only take one stance at a time.
Shelling Stance: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.
Striking Stance: Increases Speed and Dual Attack chance by {{variable}}.
Boosts firepower to **attack all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance to **dispel one buff**, before ++increasing Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: **Extends duration of buffs** granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Boosts firepower to **attack all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance to **dispel one buff**, before ++increasing Speed++ of all allies for 2 turns and ++increasing Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns.
A game console that Nana made all by herself. Its background picture is a selfie of her in a ponytail.
Has a 50% chance to make the target --unable to be buffed-- for 1 turn when ustng Quick Bombardment.
lncreases Speed and Dual Attack chance of Stance Shift's Striking Stance by an additional 5%.
Makes the target --unhealable-- for 2 turns when using Full Bombardment!.
A super fast delivery girl who brings joy to everyone overnight.

get_line.en: There was a time I was known as the Knight of White Flowers, the Keeper of Oaths... But now I am cursed.

story.en: Once one of the noblest knights in the kingdom, she was on a hunt to find the Dark Witch when she was cursed by the witch, causing her to turn her blade toward her lover and friends. The shock of her actions led her to lock herself in the witch's castle, surrounded by nothing but thornbushes and incapable of hurting anyone else.

description.en: A witch of the thornbush who brings about calamity
Throws swords at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.

Increases Hit Chance by {{variable}}. A successful attack inflicts additional damage on the enemy. Additional damage increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Upon receiving lethal damage, grants immortality to the caster for 1 turn. Immortality effect can only be activated once every 5 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a cursed thornbush, dispelling all buffs, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a cursed thornbush, dispelling all buffs, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Attack and make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

get_line.en: God wills it!

story.en: The main duty of the Church of Ilryos Butcher Corps is to track down and punish traitors or fugitives.

description.en: Butcher Corps soldiers fighting for the Church of Ilryos
Strikes the enemy with a blade, with a {{variable}} chance each to dispel two buffs.
Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed {{variable}} of max Health.
Strikes indiscriminately at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.
Strikes indiscriminately at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, and recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4034_gacha_get)

story.en: Rikoris joined the Taranor Army on Schuri's advice and mastered his skills of spearmanship in a battle against the Chaos Sect. Now he spends his time trying to ease the unrest in Taranor while becoming the greatest spearman ever.

description.en: A trustworthy captain with his own unique spearmanship
Attacks with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the caster is granted increased Speed, effect chance increases by 25%.
Encourages all allies, increasing Speed for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Encourages all allies, decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn and increasing Speed for 2 turns.

Attacks all enemies with spear art, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff from the target before a 75% chance to restrict for 2 turns. Has a 75% chance to stun the enemy with the highest Combat Readiness for 1 turn regardless of whether the attack hits, and recovers the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Why did you call me?

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. Reminiscent of the shriveled rose petals the day after a festival, Carmainerose dazzles her opponents by singing a song of her failed revenge.

description.en: A half-burned, blood-red, depressed Banshee
Claws the enemy, before absorbing some of the damage as Health.
Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.
Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}} before decreasing Speed of the enemy for 2 turns and increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy, dispelling all buffs, and increasing Attack and Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Efficiency in everything I do! Especially magic and math.

story.en: A member of the Magic Research Department, Carrot sometimes helps the Student Council with their accounting at the request of Ginger and Hazel due to her talent with numbers. She is usually rational, except for her habit of wearing decorative ears to ward off jinxes.

description.en: A sassy magic researcher who sees all magic as math
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, before detonating burn effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn.

At the moment the caster is attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier effect can only be activated once per turn, and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Attacks all enemies with powerful fire, dispelling one buff before a {{variable}} chance to burn for 1 turn.
Attacks all enemies with powerful fire, dispelling one buff before a {{variable}} chance to burn for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I feel like we'll be good friends.

story.en: In Farche, the nomadic Tuharta Clan is wiped out by a great sandstorm. Cartuja leads the few survivors as they wander in search of a new home, working day and night as a mercenary to raise enough money to save his clan.

description.en: Courageous and valiant, the greatest warrior in Farche
Attacks with sharp claws, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}} when attacked. Combat Readiness increases by an additional 10% when the caster's Health is 50% or less.

Attacks all enemies with wild energy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns, and increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, with additional damage increase when the caster's Health is 75% or less.

Attacks all enemies with wild energy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Recovers 50% of the caster's max Health before granting them increased Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, with additional damage increase when the caster's Health is 75% or less.

get_line.en: I am Cecilia. Please, feel free to call me Ceci.

story.en: A brave woman known as the Storm Dragon Knight. Cecilia is Queen of Wintenberg and has a strong sense of responsibility. She has a righteous and sincere personality, but will stubbornly resist any attempts to change her mind.

description.en:
Tough and beautiful
Queen of Wintenberg

Attacks **all enemies** with a magical spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Attack-- for 2 turns, before **dispelling one buff**. Effect chance increases by 50% when the caster's Health is 50% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks **all enemies** with a magical spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Attack-- for 2 turns, before **dispelling one buff**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Damage dealt and barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
"A requiem for the fallen heroes of Wintenberg." These are the words the blacksmith spoke as he offered this weapon to Cecilia.
Increase Deliverance's chance to decrease Defense by 10%.

skill_description.en: Attacks with a spear, with aÂ {{variable}} chance toÂ --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. When the target is inflicted with --decreased Attack--, effect chance increases by 25%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

description.en: --Decreases Speed-- of all enemies for 2 turns when using Steel Cloudburst.

skill_description.en: Attacks **all enemies** with a magical spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Attack-- for 2 turns and a 100% chance to --decrease Speed-- for 2 turns, before **dispelling one buff**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

description.en: Makes all enemies --unhealable-- for 2 turns when using Steel Cloudburst.

skill_description.en: Attacks **all enemies** with a magical spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Attack-- for 2 turns and a 100% chance to make them --unhealable-- for 2 turns, before **dispelling one buff**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

description.en: "Blame me for all of your lust and infidelity. Just close your eyes and dream of ecstasy..."

get_line.en: I will do my best.

story.en: Currently working as a private mercenary, Celeste used to be a member of Aramintha's Silver Blade Company long ago. She says little and has an earnest and very serious personality, but suffers from thinking too much and an inability to choose.

description.en: A calm and collected mercenary who loves forests and silence
Attacks the enemy, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
Shoots a volley of arrows at all enemies, with an 85% chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. When the caster's Health is 80% or more, cooldown does not occur.
Caster recovers 30% Health and is granted an extra turn.
Caster recovers 30% Health and is granted increased Attack for 2 turns and an extra turn.

get_line.en: Were you looking for me? Tell me what you want me to do.

story.en: A mysterious being from the stars, nobody knows where Celestial Mercedes came from, or what she has gone through. She freely duplicates any Human or thing she pleases, and currently resides in the Farche Frontier in a cloned body of Mercedes.

description.en: Otherworldly creature, hiding her truth
Attacks with shock magic, with a {{variable}} chance to make the enemy unhealable for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks all enemies by releasing spells of the Last Spellbook. Increases Combat Readiness by 20% according to the number of critical hits made.
Attacks all enemies by releasing spells of The Last Spellbook. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 20% according to the number of critical hits made.

get_line.en: We've met before, haven't we? Oh, we haven't? Hmm, something about you feels familiar.

story.en: A swordswoman traveling the world to spread justice, and also the aunt and role model of Karin Fantaria. Her exploits are still legendary within Reingar, where she was once a member of the Public Security Club for some time before she left to wander the world.

description.en: A wandering swordswoman relying only on her sword
Attacks the enemy with a sheath. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.

After an enemy uses a non-attack skill, **dispels all debuffs** from the caster and attacks a random enemy with Blink. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
Blink: Cuts the enemy in the blink of an eye and **increases Combat Readiness** of
the caster by 20%. Unaffected by **elemental disadvantage**.

Attacks the enemy repeatedly, and grants ++increased Evasion++ and a ++barrier++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing effects are ignored**. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**.

Attacks the enemy repeatedly. and **absorbs some of the damage dealt** as Health. Grants ++increased Evasion++ and a ++barrier++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing effects are ignored**. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**.
An armband Celine wore when she was a part of the Reingar Public Security Club. She keeps it with her to help remind her of those days.
Grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns when using Blink.
Increases damage dealt by Blink by 10% and attacks the enemy With the highest Attack.
Increases damage dealt by Thunderclap by 10%.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you. I'm sure we can be of great help to one another.

story.en: A young politician and administrator of Aakhen. She opposes her conservative father, Furious, who governs with zero-tolerance policies, and tries to solve problems with reasonable solutions as she strives to reconcile Aakhen and Perland.

description.en: The young administrator of Aakhen who dreams of a better future

Summons a mystical bow to attack the enemy, before **increasing the caster's Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}. Triggers a **Dual Attack** from a random ally when Frost Storm is unavailable due to cooldown count.
Explodes a magical sphere, --stunning-- for 1 turn and making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns. **Increases the caster's Combat Readiness** by 50%.

Attacks **all enemies** with a raging frost storm, **decreasing buff durations** by 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance each to --decrease Speed-- and --restrict-- for 2 turns. Attacks using an **advantageous element**.

Attacks **all enemies** with a raging frost storm, **decreasing buff durations** by 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance each to --decrease Speed-- and --restrict-- for 2 turns. Grants the caster ++invincibility++ for 1 turn. Attacks using an **advantageous element**.

get_line.en: Aha! I'm here to honor you with my presence.

story.en: A fiercely competitive but also horribly unlucky knight, she is very hot-headed and often gambles and loses everything. Her impulsive nature forced her parents to give all of the inheritance to her sister Carrot, who provides her an allowance to live off of.

description.en: A hot-headed knight who wields fire
Attacks with a flaming sword, with a {{variable}} chance to make the target --unhealable-- for 1 turn.
Shoots fire, **resetting the cooldown** of All-In! and granting an **extra turn**.
Shoots fire, granting the caster ++increased Attack (Greater)++ for 2 turns, **resetting the cooldown** of All-In!, and granting an **extra turn**.
Attacks with a blazing inferno, **penetrating** Defense by 50%.
Dice used on the day Cermia won a once-in-a-lifetime jackpot. She holds onto them in hopes that they'll bring her that luck again one day.
Has a 25% chance to grant an **extra attack** with the same skill when using Playing with Fire.

skill_description.en: Attacks with a flaming sword, with a {{variable}} chance to make the target --unhealable-- for 1 turn. Has a 25% chance to grant the caster an **extra attack** with the same skill.

description.en: Grants the caster a ++barrier++ for 2 turns when using Hot Streak!. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **casterâ€™s Attack**.

skill_description.en: Shoots fire, granting the caster ++increased Attack (Greater)++ and a ++barrier++ for 2 turns, **resetting the cooldown** of All-In!, and granting an **extra turn**. Barrier strength is proportional to the **caster's Attack**.

description.en: When an enemy is defeated by All-in!,  **decrease skill cooldown** of Hot Streak! by 2 turns.

skill_description.en: Attacks with a blazing inferno, **penetrating** Defense by 50%. **Decreases skill cooldown** of Hot Streak! by 2 turns when an enemy is defeated.

description.en: Cermia is enjoying her summer vacation at Levulin beach. Her frolicking in the white sand all day under the sun has given her a deep tan.

get_line.en: Look at me! The successor of the Nixied Clan!

story.en: Fiercely proud and unreserved, Challenger Dominiel has little morality or sense of empathy. While constantly causing trouble, she refuses to admit her faults.

description.en: The confident successor of Nixied
Attacks with electricity. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.
When an ally makes a critical hit, grants stackable increased Attack to the caster according to the number of critical hits made. This effect is dispelled after attacking.

When an ally makes a critical hit, grants stackable increased Attack to the caster according to the number of critical hits made and increases Combat Readiness by 10% per critical hit. This stackable increased Attack is dispelled after attacking.
Releases powerful electricity, increasing Critical Hit Chance of all allies for 3 turns, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. The caster is also granted an extra turn.

get_line.en: If you want to know what a genius looks like, eat your heart out.

story.en: Incredibly skilled in fighting, Champion Zerato boasts a flawless win streak, largely thanks to his refusal to fight anyone he may be at risk of losing to. Frost Mage Zerato has been trying to pick a fight with him for a long time, but Champion Zerato keeps making excuses to avoid it.

description.en: An arrogant and impudent supremacist who only cares about strength

Attacks two enemies including the target with an earthen blast, transferring two debuffs from the caster to the enemy and recovering the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

story.en: Following an argument with the Chaos Sect Axe, he left the Chaos Sect only to be captured soon after by the Rose Apostles. During a narrow escape, he became filled with a desperate fear of death and was awakened to the existence of Chaos.

description.en: A fanatic enlightened to the grace of Chaos

story.en: Following the end of the Archdemon War, the Church of Ilryos Axe suffered a difficult period of desolation, until the God of Chaos spoke to him. Inspired to found the Chaos Sect, he has found a new purpose to subdue the world under the blade of his axe.

description.en: An axeman who accepted the call of Chaos and founded the Chaos Sect.

get_line.en: Walking the righteous path is not easy. Hence, we must strictly cultivate ourselves!

story.en: Although he may be rigid and loyal, he cannot help but act like an overprotective servant to Aither, and will deal with all kinds of things in order to protect him.

description.en: The highly respected Knight Commander of the Order of the Sword

Charles has donned a special disguise for an investigation into a mansion surrounded by rumors. The costume was designed by Aither with inspiration taken from the costume of the main character of an exorcism novel he recently read.

get_line.en: Making new friends is a good thing.

story.en: Owner of La Mare, a castle in the Solayu Dark Swamp, Charlotte is known as the Lady of the Swamp. Fiercely competitive, she has a love-hate relationship with Cecilia. Full of pride, she despises anyone who points out her insecurities.

description.en: Duchess of La Mare, an elegant and domineering Lady of the Swamp

When the caster is buffed, Dual Swords becomes an attack that targets **all enemies** when used on the caster's turn. **Increases caster's Combat Readiness** by 20% after attacking with this changed attack, and a successful attack with this changed attack always **results in a critical hit**. This changed attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.

When attacked, the caster gains {{variable}} **Fighting Spirit** and is granted ++increased Attack++ and ++Defense++ for 1 turn.

description.en: Cuts all enemies while spinning, making them --unhealable-- for 2 turns. A successful attack always **results in a critical hit**.
The pauldron Charlotte wears over top of her cape. To Charlotte, it symbolizes the weight that a queen must bear.

get_line.en: Ta-da! It's me, the queen of everything! Chloe!

story.en: A doll who is very simple and cheerful. Uninterested in trivial details, she almost forgot the fact she herself is a doll. Since she wanders around doing as she pleases, life has become a little complicated.

description.en: A cheerful, violent, wandering doll
Hammers the enemy. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is inflicted with --magic nail--.
Attacks the enemy, inflicting --magic nail-- for 3 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%.
Attacks the enemy, inflicting --magic nail-- for 3 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%. **Ignores Effect Resistance**.

**Dispels all buffs** from the enemy when using Magic Bolt. (This effect is applied before inflicting magic nail.)

get_line.en: Let me know anytime if you need my help! But of course, I don't work for free!

story.en: Choux is a Human child who was rescued from a cold, snowy mountain by an old Mouse Suin couple fifteen years ago. Having been adopted by the couple, she grew up as the only Human in her village.

description.en: An adorable girl who wishes to become Suin

get_line.en: The Church of Ilryos saves all!

story.en: A fanatical soldier who believes in the Church of Ilryos, fighting against those who seek to oppress it, and punishing traitors.

description.en: An axeman following the Church of Ilryos

get_line.en: Badabum! I have arrived! Cidd is here! What do you want me to do?

story.en: Cidd is the youngest member and mascot of the Wild Dog Company, a group of mercenaries headquartered in an old ruined fortress in Wetheric Moor. Contrary to his cheerful and carefree appearance, he will competently complete any task assigned to him. He cares for the Wild Dog Company as if they were family.

description.en: The Wild Dog Company mascot, a wild hound as fast as the wind
Attacks with a dagger. A critical hit will increase Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
When the caster is granted increased Speed, Relentless Strike is enhanced to deal more damage and decreases Defense of the enemy for 1 turn.
Cuts with a dagger, granting an extra turn when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

get_line.en: To follow the path once tread by the Goddess is my calling.

story.en: A young nun of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Clarissa's purity made her a mascot of the church. However, as soon as she set out on her pilgrimage, her true fighting nature began to reveal itself.

description.en: A nun with a violent split personality
Attacks with a morning star, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

The caster becomes enraged for 3 turns and activates Kya-hahaha when an enemy is defeated by Harsh Lesson or Hysteric.
Kya-hahaha (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks all enemies by swinging an iron mace.

Attacks all enemies by spinning, inflicting two bleeding effects for 2 turns, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the caster is enraged, damage dealt is increased.

get_line.en: Will you call me Coli? Run with me, to the edge of the world!

story.en: Born in a village, Coli was made a refugee by the Archdemon War. She joined a band of vigilantes in order to help protect her family and has a talent for stealing items from thieves when she attacks them.

description.en: A cheerful vigilante burdened with the horrors of war

story.en: An Automatic Doll specialized in search and command. Originally created as an adult female, her body has been replaced with a younger model as a result of the discontinuation of the same model. She has inherited all of the memory data, personality traits, and behavioral algorithms belonging to Laika, the former commander of the Automatic Doll Corps.

description.en: A kind and gentle, full metal squad leader

story.en: Lorina became an official knight after defeating a Wyvern with her spear. She aims to lead the vanguard of the Order of the Shield one day, and acts without thinking based on what she believes is right.

description.en: Vice-Commander of The Order of the Shield with outstanding talent

get_line.en: To dominate, or to be dominated. There are only two options in life.

story.en: After purging all members of the incompetent family and becoming the head of the household, she subjugates the forces in South Perland and revolts. Then, using Violet, she easily overturns the whole nation and ascends to the throne. Eventually, her ambition grows to an extent that she cannot be satisfied with Perland alone, so she begins to aim for other regions in Cidonia.

description.en: Queen of blood and iron who brings despair

get_line.en: The innocent will always be saved, you damned fools!

description.en: A wild-blooded missionary, a veteran of bottomless faith

story.en: A dancer at the Crescent Moon Theatre in Savara loved by many for her outstanding beauty, talent, and the mystery that surrounds her true identity. Only a few, including her guardian, Basar, know she is Rin.

description.en: A dancing girl beloved by everyone for her mysterious charm

story.en: A destructive super cute mercenary, the nickname of Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame fits Armin perfectly. She assures that she will defend fiercely, indifferent of what she destroys while doing so.

story.en: Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield, Crozet places a strict emphasis on following the rules, and is notoriously inflexible on them. His excessive uprightness means he often does not realize when others are playing tricks on him.

description.en: Honest and incorruptible, the Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield

story.en: Corvus was originally a soldier from Rose Apostles until something caused him to lose his faith and grow disillusioned with the world, and now he only wishes for its destruction. However, he still contains a gentle side within him.

get_line.en: Hmm, who's today's lucky lady?

story.en: Prodigal son and heir of a once-famous merchant guild in Ki Ruburan, he changed greatly after going on an adventure with two of his friends. Upon his return, he took over control of his family's guild, which had since fallen to betrayals and misfortunes, and brought its fortune to new heights under its new name: the Basar Merchant Guild.

description.en: The most brilliant gem in the history of Ki Ruburan
Attacks the enemy with wind, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

When this skill is available, decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

get_line.en: You've been looking for me? You must need some new clothes! Well, you came to the right person. I can make anyone look like a model.

story.en: A designer who learned how to sew when she was taken in by Straze as a girl. After realizing that ever since he took hold of Fastus, Straze changed, she decides to look for a model to put a stop to his schemes.

description.en: An ill-tempered designer and Luluca's reliable supporter
Attacks the enemy with scissors, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

Decreases debuff durations of all allies by 2 turns and gets on stage to attack all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Decreases debuff durations of all allies by 2 turns and gets on stage to attack all enemies, increasing their skill cooldown by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

get_line.en: I am the Spirit Lord Destina. But now... I am the Saint of Light.

story.en: Nicknamed "the Beast of the Western Light," Destina is a master of light and metal who has physically manifested in the image of her deeply beloved Soul Weaver, Ruele.

description.en: Beast of the Western Light, a Spirit Lord of Light and Autumn
Attacks the enemy with a staff and **heals the ally** with the lowest Health. Healing increases proportional to the **target's max Health**.

soul_description.en: Attacks the enemy and greatly **heals all allies**. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Blesses an ally, **dispelling two debuffs** and **recovering Health** before **increasing Combat Readiness** by 30%. Healing Increases proportlonal to the **caster's max Health**.

Amount recovered increases proeortional to the **caster's max Health**. At the start of the first battle, grants ++Spirit's Blessing++ to the caster or 2 turns.
A mysterious concoction of life created by combining the laws of light and nature and the love of a noble soul.
**Dispels one debuff** from the ally with the lowest Health when using Key to an Oath.
Has a 30% chance to **reset skill cooldown** of Regen when using Regen.
**Increases Combat Readiness** of the target by an additional 20% when using Regen.
Ruele once told me all about how Humans wear pretty clothes and go out for picnics when the flowers start blooming... *giggling*"

get_line.en: Hello. I am a sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, DieneÂ Tali.

story.en: Diene, Saint of Ezera, received the Goddess's divine revelation and fearlessly led the world to victory against the Archdemon, even without the Heir of the Covenant. Later, she became Ezera's queen.

description.en: A staunchly pious nun of Ezera
Emits a ray of brilliant light, **increasing the caster's Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}. Effect doubles when caster is buffed.
With the Blessings of the Goddess, **dispels two debuffs** from all allies and grants ++barrier++ for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **target's max Health**.
A miracle of the Goddess manifests, ++increasing Attack++ of all allies for 3 turns, before **increasing the caster's Combat Readiness** by 50%.
A miracle of the Goddess manifests, ++increasing Attack++ and ++Critical Hit Resistance++ of all allies for 3 turns, before **increasing the caster's Combat Readiness** by 50%.
Diene's pocketwatch where she keeps a dried forget-me-not inside. The watch 3 hands are halted at the exact time of Diene's most beautiful moment of her life.
**Increases Combat Readiness** of the ally with the highest Attack by 5% when using Ligh of Judgment. When the caster has a buff, the effect is doubled.
Increases Blessings of the Goddess's ++barrier++ strength by 10%.
**Increases Combat Readiness** of all allies by 15% when using Blessings of the Goddess.
This story is about one iteration of the Archdemon War where Diene becomes a Magical Girl. With her Magical Fist imbued with the Goddess's love and protection, she punishes all evil.

get_line.en: Him, I'd love to cook him once.

story.en: A genius holding the power of inferno in his hands after swearing a compact with Malicus, the Lord of Fire, Dingo became a chef to make full use of his abilities. He sees all living creatures as potential ingredients.

description.en: The master chef obsessed with ingredients over all else
Cuts the enemy with a cleaver, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns. After attack, there's a 30% chance to activate Quick Grill.

Attacks all enemies with the Glove Oven, recovering the caster's Health. When the enemy is bleeding, has a {{variable}} chance to inflict burn for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Grants the caster an extra turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Competition isn't just about fighting.

story.en: A half-Gear who was born to a Human and a Gear. After being attacked by Humans, she held a deep distrust towards them, but after meeting various people she resolved those feelings. She loves humanity and nature and hates to fight, but will do so when necessary, making use of her wings, Necro and Undine.

description.en: A pure-hearted half-Gear confronting fate

name.en: I Used This to Catch Fish

description.en: Attacks **all enemies** with the power of magic, with a 25% chance each to --stun-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases on debuffed enemies.
Attacks **all enemies** with a powerful ray, **extending the duration of debuffs** by 1 turn, except for those which prevent the enemy from moving.

get_line.en: Will you please...become my doll? I'll make you so pretty...

story.en: A Banshee who dreams of a peaceful life in a house full of dolls. Unfortunately, her means of achieving her dreams are extremely violent. Tired of trying to collect dolls, she's now on a journey to learn how to make them herself.

description.en: A mad Banshee who would do anything for her dream, no matter the risk

Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense for 2 turns and deals additional damage equivalent to 30% of the target's max Health.

get_line.en: I am Dominiel Nixied, successor to the Nixied Clan.

story.en: Successor of a clan that has long served the Spirit Lord Nixied. After incredible effort she finally succeeded in harnessing Nixied's power, but still lacks confidence in her abilities.

description.en: Hard-working mage blessed by the Spirit Lord Nixied
Throws ice fragments at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Casts a barrier over all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Casts a barrier and reflect on all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Attacks all enemies with a large block of ice, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn and a {{variable}} chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 30%.

get_line.en: I'll do my best not to let you down.

story.en: Born to a noble Taranor family, Doris was forced to flee to Reingar after receiving a huge inheritance to escape her greedy stepmother. She wants to heal those wounded with her magic.

description.en: A noble lady who embraces those wounded
Attacks with light energy, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 35% with light magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 50% with light magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Good to meet you. My...name is...Eaton.

story.en: A mysterious Golem who stops people from entering certain areas, their muddled memories mean they don't know what they are protecting or why. Recently, they have begun to question whether they really ever were a Human, or if they are simply a Golem with the memories of a Human. Every time they encounter Humans they approach them out of pure curiosity, but often end up fighting due to a rumor that was spread in the past.

description.en: A lonely guard with fading memories
Strongly knees the enemy, with a 75% chance each to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Receives 30% of damage taken by an ally in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Increases max Health by {{variable}}.
Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Did... Did you call for me? Oh, you didn't? W-Was I not supposed to come here? Oh, sorry...

story.en: A Half-Elf who made a name for herself as a high wizard in Lefundos long, long ago. She disappeared without a trace after causing a massive explosion in a war.

description.en: A high wizard born in the shadow of misfortune
Attacks the enemy with shards of ice, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 1 turn.
Attacks **all enemies** with an explosion of ice, **dispelling one buff** before **decreasing Combat Readiness** by a random amount between 15% and 40%. Grants the caster ++skill nullifier++ once.

Releases energy to attack **all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance to --stun-- for 1 turn. When an ally uses a non-attack skill and this skill is available according to cooldown count, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20%.

Releases energy to attack **all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance to --stun-- for 1 turn, and **increases Combat Readiness** of all allies by 20%. When an ally uses a non-attack skill and this skill is available according to cooldown count, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20%.

get_line.en: Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs, so use them.

story.en: The Fullmetal Alchemist who shows an innate talent for alchemy. The Automail he equips as his right arm and left leg is the most distinguishable trait. Though he is gifted with a genius brain and an aptitude for fighting, there is nothing that enrages him more than being commented on for his short height.

description.en: A genius alchemist who has a steel arm and leg.
Attacks the enemy with a transmuted blade, and grants a ++barrier++ to the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt and barrier strength increase proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

After being attacked, when the caster has a debuff, **dispels one debuff** and activates Rise!. Rise! can only be activated once per turn.
Rise!: **Attacks all enemies** with ground thorns, **dispelling one buff** and inflicting a --random debuff-- for 2 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Attacks the enemy together with Alphones. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing effects are ignored**. Damage dealt increases proprotional to the **caster's max Health**. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks the enemy together with Alphones, and **increase Combat Readiness** by 50%. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing effects are ignored**. Damage dealt increases proprotional to the **caster's max Health**. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

get_line.en: I'm Elena, a descendant of the stars.

story.en: From a young age, her parents taught her the doctrine of the stars. Despite her youth, she now leads the faithful of Constella with her unwavering devotion and strong connection to the Spirits.

description.en: High Priestess of Constella gazing up at the shining stars
Attacks with the power of the stars, **dispelling one debuff** each from two allies.

When an ally suffers an attack that targets all enemies, decreases the **damage received** by {{variable}} and activates Consecrated Ground. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. Consecrated Ground can be activated once every 2 turns.
Consecrated Ground: **Recovers the Health** of all allies before **increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Attacks **all enemies** with a meteor shower, granting ++invincibility++ to all allies for 1 turn.
Attacks **all enemies** with a meteor shower, granting ++invincibility++ for 1 turn and ++increased Effect Resistance++ for 2 turns to all allies.
An accessory Elena was given after becoming the high priestess of Constella. With its light, it guides her even through the darkest of nights.
With Consecrated Ground's effect, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by an additional
**Dispels one debuff** from all allies before the skill effect when using Eternally Shining Comet.
Decreases cooldown of Eternally Shining Comet by 1 turn.
Elena got all dressed up to celebrate the Snowflake Festival. She's hoping to show off her outfit to as many people as possible.

get_line.en: My romance clip is totally empty!

story.en: Elphelt is a warm-hearted girl who loves nature and animals, and the type of person who would never ignore someone who is lonely or in pain. Her optimistic personality makes her believe that nothing is impossible. She is a daydreamer who often gets lost in her imagination and loves a romantic tale.

description.en: A pure, optimistic girl who wants to understand love
Fires a barrage of bullets at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to make them --unable-- to be buffed for 1 turn.

Traps the enemy in a cake, before attacking them with a cake-cutting blade and ++increasing Attack++ of all allies for 2 turns. When the enemy is --asleep--, --decreases Defense-- of all enemies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases **proportional to the number of debuffs** inflicted on the enemy.
**Dispels two buffs** from the enemy before shooting a bullet of love, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to --sleep-- for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

**Dispels two buffs** from the enemy before shooting a bullet of love, with a {{variable}} chance each to put them to --sleep-- and --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. Grants the caster an **extra turn**.

get_line.en: I'm still an apprentice, but I'll do my best!

story.en: A knight apprentice of the Order of the Sword, Elson. He is originally from Ezera, yet his parents left for Savara to set up a business of their own. He is kind and friendly but lacks confidence.

description.en: A kind and friendly Order of the Sword apprentice
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.
Attacks all enemies with Meteor Shower of Light and recovers the Health of all allies. Healing increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Recovers Health and increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Recovers Health and increases Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: My name is Emilia. Let me know if there's anything I can do to help you.

story.en: A silver-haired half-Elf, Emilia came to Ritania through a Chaos Gate. She is kind and friendly and always does her best to help out those in difficult situations.

description.en: A silver-haired half-Elf from another world
Attacks the enemy with ice, before **recovering Health** of the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the **casterâ€˜s max Health**.
Grants a blessing to an ally except for the caster, **dispelling two debuffs** and **increasing Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}. **Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 25%.

Grants a blessing to an ally except for the caster, **dispelling two debuffs** and ++increasing Attack++ for 2 turns before **increasing Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}. **Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 25%.

soul_description.en: **Recovers Health** of the target. Amount recovered increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

name.en: Divine Protection of the Great Spirit

description.en: Uses spiritual arts to **dispel two debuffs** from all allies, before **recovering Health** and granting a ++barrier++ for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

get_line.en: Hmph, pleased to meet you.

story.en: A nasty, arrogant and ambitious man with an inflated sense of his own abilities, Enott used his connections with a noble Ezera family to become a priest of the Rose Apostles.

description.en: A sly and selfish priest of the Rose Apostles
Attacks with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Attacks with a sharp blow, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Defense and make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.
Corrects stance, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Corrects stance, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Chance of the caster for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

get_line.en: Tell me what you desire, and I will give it to you. In return, you will become my sword, unquestioning and unyielding.

story.en: The son of the previous king, Tarman, and his concubine, Camellia. Ervalen and Schniel did not get along well initially, but after Schniel exposed the abuse Ervalen was receiving and began taking care of him, they grew close.

description.en: An illegitimate child of the Lefundos royal family aiming for everyone's recognition
Rapidly attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns.

Attacks the enemy repeatedly. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **Combat Readiness** of the caster **increases** proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 30%.

Attacks the enemy repeatedly and grants the caster ++immunity++ for 1 turn. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **Combat Readiness** of the caster **increases** proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 30%.

Attacks the enemy with a sword, adopting a ++counterattacking++ stance and granting a ++barrier++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, **extends buff** durations of the caster by 1 turn and grants an **extra turn**. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **damage dealt increases proportional to the difference**, up to a maximum of 70%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**.

get_line.en: Have you seen Kayron, the guy running around with a huge pocket watch? Oh, wait a second... Where am I?

story.en: Tenebria managed to break into the world of magical fairy tales. As she acts on her wishes without concern for the original plot, the once peaceful fairytale land plunges deeper and deeper into chaos.

description.en: A beautiful and horrific harbinger of chaos in a fairytale land
Attacks the enemy with a mystical power, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict --redirected provoke-- for 1 turn.

When an ally is attacked by an enemy inflicted with --provoke-- or --redirected provoke--, activates Shuffle. Shuffle can only be activated once per turn.
Shuffle: Attacks **all enemies** and inflicts a --random debuff-- for 1 turn. A successful attack against a target inflicted with provoke or redirected provoke inflicts **additional damage**. Additional damage increases proportional to the **target's max Health**.
Lures **all enemies** in with a tea party and attacks, making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns and inflicting --redirected provoke-- for 1 turn.
Lures **all enemies** in with a tea party and attacks, **dispelling one buff**, making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns, and inflicting --redirected provoke-- for 1 turn.

get_line.en: Who am I? Hmm... Youâ€™re better off not knowing.

story.en: After being taken into a cult at a young age and enduring a childhood of suffering, Faithless Lidica finally managed to escape and is now on the run. Naturally, this experience has given her a skepticism towards religion and hatred of fanatics.

description.en: Striving for a new life while on the run
Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
Binds all enemies with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25% per target. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

Binds all enemies with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25% per target and all other allies' by 5% per target. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.
Attacks the enemy indiscriminately, increasing skill cooldown to max. A critical hit grants all allies skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack.

get_line.en: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.

story.en: Kluri started raising a falcon in hope of reducing her workload. Although it ended up doing the exact opposite, she's carried on raising it for fun. Perhaps it learned from its master, because it will never do anything too difficult unless Kluri orders it to.

description.en: A sharp-eyed mercenary, and friend of Fluri
Slams the enemy, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Recovers {{variable}} Health of the caster at the beginning of every turn.
Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs, before a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.
Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs, before a {{variable}} chance each to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Are you someone whom I can trust?

story.en: Fallen Cecilia is chasing a mage who turned her family into dark magic stones, dreaming of the day she can get her revenge and join her loved ones again.

description.en: A dark dragon bound by a desire for revenge and an endless grudge
Attacks with a spear of revenge, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Grants a barrier for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Grants a barrier for 2 turns to all allies at the start of the battle, and grants a barrier for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Attacks all enemies in an explosion ofÂ spiteful emotions. Grants all allies skill nullifier, negating damage received from the next skill attack.Â Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I know I can fight better than anyone!

story.en: The second magic doll to be created in Reingar, modeled on Maya with incredible combat skills and a belligerent attitude. She is the type to learn and grow from her experiences, but having been created only a short time ago, she tends to be childish and overly honest about her feelings. She is fond of her sparring partner, Zerato.

description.en: A magic doll of Reingar created for battles
Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff and be granted increased Defense for 2 turns when attacked. Can only be triggered once per turn.
Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff and be granted increased Defense for 2 turns when attacked.

Attacks with a powerful smash. Damage dealt increases by 300% when the enemyâ€™s Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the casterâ€™s Defense. Grants the caster an extra turn when the enemy is defeated.

get_line.en: Are you friend or foe? Not that it matters. You'll be on my side once we're finished.

story.en: A practical negotiator, Flan is devoted to the development of the city she works for. As she is a newer model, she is equipped with a variety of useful functions, but she lacks durability. She adores Landy like a real big sister.

description.en: Politia's foreign minister, representing the city's interests
Attacks the enemy with a gun, with a {{variable}} chance to **dispel one buff**.
Encourages an ally, ++increasing Attack++ and ++Critical Hit Damage++ for 2 turns before **increasing Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}.
Drives a hard bargain against all enemies, --decreasing Defense-- for 2 turns before **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 15%.
Drives a hard bargain against all enemies, making them --unhealable-- and --decreasing Defense-- for 2 turns before **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 15%.

get_line.en: Here I am! More beautiful than the morning dew, more graceful than a blooming roseâ€”I am Tieria.

story.en: A bounty hunter chasing criminals across Orbis. She's as beautiful as a flower and loves to be complimented for her looks.

description.en: A beautiful and lonely adventurer chasing criminals
Attacks the enemy with an axe, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.
Releases condensed energy at all enemies, recovering Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt.
Releases condensed energy at all enemies, recovering Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt. Resets this skill's cooldown when an enemy is defeated.
Dashes towards the enemy and cuts them down with a powerful strike, decreasing Defense for 2 turns. A critical hit will grant immunity to the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Do you need a leader?

story.en: A man of principle, Furious believes that a leader should serve the community, not individuals. He believes that the citylord is an important cog in the machine that is Aakhen.

description.en: The stubborn Citylord of Aakhen
Fires a gun while dashing towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 2 turns.
Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns.
Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns, before granting an extra turn to the caster.
Attacks with a fatal shot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: It is a general's duty to lead his people along the right path.

story.en: Daring and responsible, General Purrgis will never abandon his subordinates in a dangerous situation, and commands all of their respect.

description.en: A cool-headed general commanding the respect of all
Mows down the enemy with a great sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
After being attacked, increases Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.
Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun two random enemies for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun two random enemies for 1 turn, before increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Why would anyone "talk it out" when they could just use their fists? Let's go, right now! Whoever wins, wins!

story.en: Back when he was a street fighter, Glenn was found by Godmother after being assaulted and left there, broken and dying in the street. He respects her for saving him and giving him a place to stay.

description.en: A reformed vigilante of the back streets
Rapidly shoots the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Fires a missile at the enemy, and when the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction. Hit Chance is increased by 15% when using this skill.
Using an enhancement cube, grants the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns.
Using an enhancement cube, grants the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns and an extra turn.

get_line.en: Uhh... Hello?

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. When the ruins are masked in fog, she sings songs of rumors. Looking like a small lantern flame flickering in the darkness, if you allow yourself to be tempted you will lose your life in a moment.

description.en: A Banshee like lonely rain falling on a foggy city
Has a {{variable}} chance of being granted an extra turn after attacking the enemy.
Has a {{variable}} chance of being granted an extra turn after attacking the enemy. When the caster is debuffed, the chance is doubled.
Increases Attack by {{variable}} and Speed by {{variable}} when the caster is debuffed. Grants immunity to stun, sleep, and provoke.
Attacks all enemies with magic, with a {{variable}} chance to transfer all debuffs inflicted on the caster, and dispels all debuffs from the caster.

get_line.en: Well, well... Looks like I've got one more troublemaker to take care of.

story.en: A former police executive in Politia, Godmother is now in charge of a vigilante group in the Unregulated Area. Thanks to her, what was once a lawless area is now united and properly managed.

description.en: Godmother of the back streets who leads the discarded
Shoots the enemy with a pistol, with a {{variable}} chance to target them for 2 turns.
Attacks with a powerful missile, before a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Hit Chance and Attack for 1 turn.
Utilizes the power of an enhancement cube, granting all allies increased Speed for 2 turns.
Utilizes the power of an enhancement cube, granting all allies increased Speed and Effectiveness for 2 turns.

get_line.en: It is a great chief's responsibility to look after all of Meldrec and the Muhr.

story.en: After being chosen by Malicus in the Great Chief Exam, Khawana has become the great chief. She successfully unites all tribes into one unified Meldrec, but the land soon falls into civil war due to Inferno Khawazu. Not once has she beaten Khawazu, and for that, she holds both great respect as well as a sense of inferiority toward him.

description.en: The chosen successor who wields a pure flame
Cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to restrict for 1 turn. Has a {{variable}} chance to restrict for 2 turns when the target is a Light elemental enemy.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}. When an ally is attacked by a Dual Attack, increases Attack of the caster by 15%. Increased Attack effect can stack up to five times.
Releases power to dispel two debuffs from all allies and increase Speed for 2 turns. Grants an extra turn.
Releases power to dispel two debuffs from all allies and grant increased Speed and a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Grants an extra turn.

get_line.en: Hi! Will you introduce yourself? Will you play with me?

story.en: An ever-cheerful traveler, Aither loves life on the road. As he embarks on a journey to find his lost memories, he is often followed by small animals.

description.en: A free and nimble little bird that has lost its memories
Attacks with spirit power, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Attacks with spirit power, and grants caster a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.
Attacks with spirit power, and heals all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Delivers a blow to the enemy with spirit power, and heals all allies before granting continuous healing for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

get_line.en: The worth of a man is not determined by appearance but by actions. I'll forge my own way no matter what!

story.en: A veteran of the Archdemon War, Gunther is often misunderstood because of his rough-looking face, but he is a highly-talented treasure hunter.

description.en: A carefree and tough warrior known as the Slaughterer
Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns.
The caster does not deal a critical hit, but Attack increases by {{variable}}, and Critical Hit Resistance increases by 70%.
Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn.
Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Who do you want me to kill?

story.en: Trained since he was young, Haste is the optimal assassin. Part of the Sicar assassin organization, he is fearless and hates losing. He has no interest in other people, but deep down he yearns for the same close relationships they hold.

description.en: An aloof boy trained in assassination
Attacks the enemy with an enormous scythe,Â with a {{variable}} chance to **steal one buff**.
Attacks the enemy with a scythe and **recovers the Health of all allies**. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

Attacks the enemy with a scythe, making them --unhealable-- and inflicting --vampiric touch-- for 2 turns, and **recovers the Health of all allies**. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

Attacks **all enemies** with Envoy's Scythe, **dispelling two buffs** before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two --bleeding-- effects for 2 turns. A critical hit has a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies. This skill **cannot trigger a counterattack**.
A chocker Haste ha been wearing ever since the day he ended up alone. He always feels an unquenchable thirst.
**Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 15% when using Envoy's Scythe.
Has a 75% chance to inflict --bleeding-- on the target for 2 turns when using Envoy's Scythe.
Decreases cooldown Vampiric Seal by 1 turn.

get_line.en: In this cruel world...only the strongest survive.

story.en: A  descendant of Suin taken as slaves by settlers from Ritania. He was able to earn his freedom at a young age thanks to the sacrifices of his family but had to become a street fighter in the criminal underground to survive. Just as he began opening up to others and finding inner peace, he lost all of his friends after his disciple Batisse went on a rampage. Now, he seeks revenge.

description.en: A wandering Suin burdened with guilt
Smashes the enemy with their knee, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Attacks the enemy with wind pressure. Activates Wind Pressure again when an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.
Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, before increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Hazel Stressa, Black Sheep-- Uhh, I mean, clerk of the Student Council.

story.en: Younger sister of Ginger, the vice president of the student council, Hazel is the self-styled "Black Sheep" clerk of the student council. An inflexible, sharp-tongued slob, yet also an extensively knowledgeable model student. She has a detailed understanding of the personal relationships and weaknesses of everyone in Reingar.

description.en: The savvy model student clerk of the Student Council
Attacks with fire magic, with a {{variable}} chance to make unhealable for 2 turns.

Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Amount recovered is doubled when the target's Health is 50% or less.
