Uses strengthening magic to increase Attack of all allies for 1 turn before recovering Health and dispelling one debuff. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Uses strengthening magic to increase Attack of all allies for 2 turns before recovering Health and dispelling one debuff. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Don't you dare look down on me. I will gore you.

story.en: Though small in stature, Helga is a fierce eyed bounty hunter who is never without her trademark axe and horned helm. Rough-spoken and rough-tempered, she has no time for those who look down on her, and prefers to work alone.

description.en: A treasure hunter with a love for big axes and horned helms
Attacks with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Encourages allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: Wow, thereâ€™s delicious food everywhere I look! Oh, but now's not the time to daydream, I have to get in line!

story.en: For her vacation, Yufine's visiting a resort with a special goal in mind: to try each and every dish she's never seen in Ezera!

description.en: A lively Dragon girl who is passionate about having fun and eating

Attacks the enemy by tearing up a food market, with a {{variable}} chance to --burn-- for 1 turn. When used on the caster's turn, Just One Bite! â™¡ becomes an attack that targets all enemies. Changed attack is **unaffected by elemental disadvantage** and does not trigger a Dual Attack.

Reduces the **effect of decreased Combat Readiness** debuffs inflicted on all allies by {{variable}}. This skill effect does not stack with other passive skills of the same name. Increase Evasion by 35%, and increase Evasion by an additional 35% when the caster is at max Health.
**Dispels two debuffs** from all allies and **attacks all enemies** in the middle of a night market. ++Increased Attack++ of all allies for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: **Dispels two debuffs** from all allies and **attacks all enemies** in the middle of a night market. ++Increased Attack++ of all allies for 2 turns and **Combat Readiness** by 20%.

get_line.en: Nice meeting you.

story.en: Hurado is a mercenary with no memories, wandering in search for his home. Unlike his intimidating appearance, he is extremely kind and sincere, and vulnerable to being conned by others.

description.en: Where am I from? A wandering mercenary who lost his memory
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn.
Decreases amount recovered of all enemies by {{variable}}, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 20% when the enemy uses a non-attack skill.
Attacks all enemies with dark magic, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.
Attacks all enemies with dark magic, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.

get_line.en: To exceed one's limit is impossible without exerting an extraordinary amount of effort.

story.en: In the past, Hwayoung used to be one of Natalon's strongest fighters. However, both of her arms were severely injured during a fight against the Suin. Some time later, Hwayoung took Ken as her pupil, but following his disapperance, she settled in a human village in the Prairie.

description.en: A wandering fighter who works hard to transcend her limits.
Attacks the enemy with a kick. When the caster is buffed, a successful attack inflicts **additional damage** proportional to the **caster's Attack**.

Attack increases by {{variable}}. When attacking, **cannot trigger a critical hit**. **Damage** suffered from a **critical hit decreases** by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the start of the battle and at the end of the turn, grants a ++barrier++ to the caster for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

Attack the enemy with a secret technique and grants ++immunity++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the target's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **penetrates** the target's Defense, with penetration rate increasing proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 100%.

After **dispelling all debuffs** from the caster, attacks the enemy with a secret technique and grants ++immunity++ to the caster for 2 turns. When the target's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, **penetrates** the target's Defense, with penetration rate increasing proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 100%.

get_line.en: My name? Call me whatever you want. Everyone else does. "Hey," "you there," "scrap metal..." I'm sure you'll come up with something.

story.en: Ian behaves very courteously, but deep down, he questions why he needs to wait on Humans hand and foot. He dreams about a future where the roles are reversed and his kind rules over Humans.

description.en: An Automatic Doll from the stars who guards his inner thoughts closely
Fires an enhanced pistol, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff from the enemy.
Supports all allies using an enhancement cube, granting increased Attack for 2 turns. Grants an extra turn to the caster.
Attacks all enemies with powerful explosives, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with powerful explosives, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff, before a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns. Grants the caster skill nullifier once.

get_line.en: If you're going to stand on the same battlefield as me, fight like you're ready to die. Or I'll kill you myself.

story.en: A Dragon Knight who became Winterberg's queen after Cecilia. Ilynav belives working with Dragons is a disgrace to those who were killed by their hand, and considers those who fear the war and hope for peace to be cowars.

description.en: An aggressive warmonger who commands brave soldiers

Attacks the enemy with a spear. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. When this skill is used, if it was not triggered by a Dual Attack, has a **50% chance to use Punish** instead of Rush. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

Attacks and pierces the enemy, inflicting **injuries**. ++Increases Defense++ of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. The severity of **injuries** increases proportional to the damage dealt. **Injuries** decrease max Health of the target by up to 20% every time this skill is used.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks **all enemies** mercilessly and ++Increase Critical Hit Damage++ of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Attacks **all enemies** mercilessly and ++Increase Critical Hit Damage++ of all allies for 2 turns and ++Immunity++ to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
A stone with an odd power that has been handed down to the queen of Winterberg for generations.
Decrease cooldown of Punish by 1 turn.
Grants a ++barrier++ to the caster for 2 turns when using Repel. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
**Increase Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50% when using Repel.

get_line.en: My name is Iseria, the Knight of White Flowers, and the keeper of oaths.

story.en: Second-in-Command of the Order of the Sword, Iseria is an Elf unable to return to her ancestral home of Dun Blyraia due to some reason. Known as the Knight of White Flowers, she has a calm and solemn personality.

description.en: The Knight of White Flowers, protector of a solemn oath
Throws swords at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance by 50% and increases damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: **Resets skill cooldown** of an ally except for the caster with light energy.
**Resets skill cooldown** of an ally except for the caster with light energy. Grants an **extra turn**.
Attacks the enemy with a giant Magic Sword, **dispelling all buffs**, before --decreasing Defense-- and making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns.
Attending the New Year party at Tirel Castle, lseria looks awkward in her new dress.

get_line.en: Your psyche is... Ehehe... Okay, yeah, let's just start.

story.en: An artificial being that was created to stop Justice's revival. With half of the soul of Sol's past lover, Aria, she has a split personality: one is that of a collected adult, and the other is that of a child-like one. Therefore, in order to control her mood swings, she wears a mask when in battle.

description.en: A mischievous fighter who fights together with Servants.

Attacks the enemy with a servant, with a {{variable}} chance to --stun-- for 1 turn. After attacking on the caster's turn, when the target has a debuff, activates Dust Attack as an **extra attack**.
Dust Attack: Attacks the enemy by throwing them into the air, granting ++stealth++ to the caster for 1 turn.

At the start of the battle, grants ++Chain of Chiron++ to the ally in the back row for 2 turns. After an ally attacks, when the target is stunned, **increase Combat Readiness** of all allies by {{variable}}. This effect is activated after all of the attacker's effects have occurred, and can only be activated once every 3 turns.

++Increase Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns, before attacking the enemy by swallowing them with a jack-o'-lanter. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. When the target has a debuff, damage dealt increases.

++Increase Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns, before attacking the enemy by swallowing them with a jack-o'-lanter. When the enemy is defeated, grants an **extra turn**. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. When the target has a debuff, damage dealt increases.

get_line.en: I will do my best to live up to your expectations.

story.en: A mercenary from the Itan Clan, Jecht is committed to self-discipline and hopes to improve the treatment of his fellow Suin by becoming a skilled and famous warrior.

description.en: A hard worker who dreams of becoming the world's strongest mercenary
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
{{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff inflicted on an ally at the beginning of each turn.
Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing to all allies for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing and increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Do you have some more work for me?

story.en: A calm and cautious mage of the Rose Apostles, Jena is rarely agitated by anything. She is childhood friends with fellow Rose Apostle, Lidica.

description.en: A composed mage of the Rose Apostles
Attacks with a staff, dealing damage proportional to number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.
Casts weakening magic on all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.
Casts weakening magic on all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack and Speed for 2 turns. Decreased Speed debuff ignores Effect Resistance.
Attacks all enemies with frost magic, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

get_line.en: This is my duty. I will go with you until the world ends.

story.en: An Heir of the Sixth World, Kise is leader of the Nocturnes. She fought every battle against the Archdemon alongside the Guardian Kromcruz. Though she can be sluggish and sharp-tongued, she cares greatly for her fellow Heirs.

description.en: An observer of fate, the Heir who watches over the world
Attacks with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns.
Attacks **all enemies** with a scythe, --decreasing Hit Chance-- for 1 turn.

Attacks **all enemies** by distorting space and time, before a {{variable}} chance each to **dispel one buff** and **increase skill cooldown** two times by 1 turn. Grants ++skill nullifier++ once to the caster. **Damage dealt increases with more enemies**.

Attacks **all enemies** by distorting space and time. before a {{variable}} chance each to **dispel one buff** and **increase skill cooldown** three times by 1 turn. Grants ++skill nuillfier++ once to the caster. **Damage dealt increases with more enemies**.
Kise is reborn as a saint through a dignified sacrifice. Her sacrifice will remain in someone's heart forever.

get_line.en: Public Security Club Officer Judith, reporting in!

story.en: A cute and cheerful member of Reingar's Public Security Club, Judith originally came to Reingar as a thief with her eyes on magical artifacts. However, she enjoyed her time in the Public Security Club so much, she eventually forgot her original goal. She is an old friend of the Longtail Company's commander, Armin.

description.en: A Public Security Club officer, who on second glance is revealed as a thief
Attacks with dual-wielded swords. When the caster is stealthed, has a {{variable}} chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.
At the moment the caster is attacked, has a {{variable}} chance to become stealthed for 1 turn.
Increases the Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.
Increases the Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}, and grants stealth for 1 turn.

get_line.en: Protector of justice, truth, magic and! Uh, what comes after that? In any case, Lieutenant Karin has arrived!

story.en: Second Lieutenant in the Public Security Club of Reingar, Karin struggles to maintain order in the Magical Academy, a place brimming with dangerous creativity. Many call her the conscience and the real big boss of the Public Security Club.

description.en: The righteous prosecutor of the Public Security Club
Strikes the enemy with a sword. A critical hit will decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn.
Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn and grant an extra turn to the caster.
Cuts the enemy with lightning speed. Damage dealt increases with a critical hit.

get_line.en: I knew you'd ask for me soon.

story.en: An abandoned child found by magical scholars of Witchaven, Kawerik enlisted in the Enhanced Magic Division and made important contributions in the Archdemon War that Diene took part in. However, the side effects of the experiment have left him suffering from paralysis that is slowly killing him and have turned him into a cold-blooded contract killer.

description.en: A mage left with nothing after seeking his revenge
Approaches the enemy through subspace and attacks, before a {{variable}} chance to silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's Speed**.

Attacks the enemy in a dimensional corridor, with a {{variable}} chance each to **dispel two buffs** before **increasing skill cooldowns** by 1 turn twice. Grants ++stealth++ to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **target's Speed**.

Attacks the enemy in a dimensional corridor, with a {{variable}} chance each to **dispel two buffs** before **increasing skill cooldowns** by 1 turn twice. Grants ++stealth++ and ++increased Speed++ to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **target's Speed**.
Attacks **all enemies** with an explosion, --silencing-- for 1 turn. **Penetrates** Defense by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **casterâ€™s Speed**.
A token given to the leader of the Enhanced Magic Division. To ensure the past is never forgotten, he keeps it with him at all times.
Before attacking, ++increases Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns when usmg Dimensional Explosion.
--Decreases Hit Chance-- for 1 turn when using Dimensional Explosion.
Increases damage dealt by Dimensional Explosion by 20%.

get_line.en: I have descended in answer to your call.

story.en: An Acolyte, and commander of an army of undead known as the Dust Walkers. It is said that he demands your soul and loyalty in return for releasing you from your grudges.

description.en: The Shadow King who deals in grudges

Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Hit Chance-- for 1 turn, dealing damage proportional to the **caster's lost Health**. When this skill is used, if it was not triggered by a Dual Attack and the caster has a buff, this skill changes into an attack that targets all enemies. The changed attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Grants ++immortality++ and ++increased Evasion++ for 1 turn when the caster receives lethal damage and **resets skill cooldown** of Apocalypse. Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turns.

Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword. When the enemy is defeated, **extends the duration of any buffs** granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's lost Health**.

Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword, before ++increasing Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, **extends the duration of any buffs** already granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's lost Health**.
A marble filled with the grudges of people who pledged their souls and loyalty to Kayron
Increases Damage dealt by Void Slash by 10%.
Increases Damage dealt by Apocalypse by 10%.
Inflicts --silence-- for 1 turn when using Apocalypse.
A rabbit waiting for someone. With a tired look on his face, he looks down at his watch every three seconds and heaves a sigh.

get_line.en: Leave everything to me!

story.en: Born an orphan, Ken has faced many hardships in his life, but manages to maintain a bright and optimistic personality. He believes the only way to survive is through strength, and dedicates his life to training and always admires the strong.

description.en: I will become stronger! A lively fist-fighter

Attacks with a flurry of strikes, with a 50% chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. --Burns-- the enemy for 2 turns when the caster is granted ++vigor++. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Kicks the enemy, --decreasing Defense-- for 2 turns before granting the caster ++increased Speed++ for 2 turns. Gains 40 **Fighting Spirit** when an enemy is defeated. When the caster is granted ++vigor++, **ignores Effect Resistance**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, --stunning-- for 1 turn. Grants ++vigor++ to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Starts the first battle with 50 **Fighting Spirit**, and gains 5 **Fighting Spirit** when attacked.

Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, --decreasing Attack-- for 2 turns and --stunning-- for 1 turn. Grants ++vigor++ to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Starts the first battle with 50 **Fighting Spirit**, and gains 5 **Fighting Spirit** when attacked.

get_line.en: Hi! I'm Khawana! Where are you from?

story.en: Despite being the clever younger sister of the Great Chief, Khawana holds no political ambitions and is instead far more interested in spending quality time with friends and family, collecting interesting things, and experiencing new cultures.

description.en: A curious and cheerful adventurer from Meldrec
Attacks the enemy with sharp sickles, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy with sharp sickles, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. If the enemy is debuffed after the attack, additional damage is inflicted.

Attacks all enemies with a flame guardian, before increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, grants all allies skill nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

Attacks the enemy with a flame guardian, dispelling two buffs before stunning for 1 turn. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

get_line.en: I am the leader of Meldrec.

story.en: A warrior of the Emberstorm tribe who ascended to Great Chief at a young age. He leads Meldrec with a stubborn insistence not to rely on outside assistance, but due to conflict between tribes, invading Unknowns, and the disappearance of Malicus, his troubles are starting to pile up.

description.en: The Great Chief of Meldrec who is undergoing a difficult trial

Attacks the enemy with a ball of flame,Â with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. After attacking, has a 35% chance to activate Burning Vitality.
Burning Vitality: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.
When the caster is debuffed after being attacked, dispels all debuffs andÂ increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turns.
Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable and decreasing Defense for 1 turn each.
Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable and decreasing Defense for 2 turns each.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c3084_gacha_get)

story.en: Machinery based on the Kikirat. It has cleaning functionality for comfort, but often mistakes Humans forÂ trash.

description.en:
High-tech machinery
modeled after Gigantes
Attacks with a gatling gun, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Increases Defense of the caster by {{variable}} after attacking. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Fires indiscriminately at all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

Fires indiscriminately at all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, before triggering counterattacks from the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

get_line.en: Ah... did you call me?

story.en: An Elf of Dun Blyraia, Kiris left her home after losing her lover to the Archdemon War and joined the Sicar assassin organization. She is often absent-minded, but as you get to know her you discover she possesses an acute sense.

description.en: A Sicar assassin with a lot to hide
Fires a poisoned arrow at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.
Fires a corrosive volley to all enemies, extending any debuff duration by 1 turn.

Strengthens the caster's next attack, increases Combat Readiness by 50%.
Venomous Arrow: Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.
Corrosive Volley: Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.

Strengthens the caster's next attack, granting an extra turn.
Venomous Arrow: Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.
Corrosive Volley: Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.

get_line.en: The moonlight brought you to me.

story.en: Leader of the Nocturnes. Having been forced to part with her lover, she now has a tendency to obsess over anything she loves.

description.en: A mysterious woman who appears with the moonlight
Attacks with a scythe. Damage dealt increases by 70% when the target is buffed.
Attacks **all enemies** with a scythe. **Penetrates** the enemy's Defense by 30%, and by an additional 30% when the caster is ++stealthed++.

Leaps towards the enemy to attack. Grants the caster ++stealth++ and a ++barrier++ for 2 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** by 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's current Health ratio**.

Leaps towards the enemy to attack, **increasing skill cooldowns** by 1 turn twice. Grants the caster ++stealth++ and a ++barrier++ for 2 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** by 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's current Health ratio**.
The weapon Kise uses that is infused with Lunaris's power. She delivers fair judgments with a swing of this scythe's cold, sharp blade.
**Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 15% after usrng Full Moon Scythe.
Increases damage dealt by Dark Scar by 10%.
**Decreases buff durations** of the target by 1 turn when using Nocturne. (This effect is applied before increasrng skill cooldown.)

get_line.en: Are you my new servant, meow?

story.en: The Holy Order of the Blue Cross requested that Reingar find a way to calm Clarissa down. Instead, the researchers focused on how cats can still be loved after wreaking havoc. Then they turned her into a cat to eliminate everyone's complaints about her violence.

description.en: Battle-driven sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross who turned into a cat
Attacks with a morning star. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. When the caster is granted loveliness, triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 2 turns. When the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%.

Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease buff duration by 2 turns and make them unhealable for 2 turns. When the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%.
Wiggles tail cutely, decreasing debuff duration on all allies by 2 turns, and granting the caster immunity and loveliness for 3 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

get_line.en: Hello, everyone! Kizuna AI here! I'm still trying my hardest, so please keep watching!

story.en: Originally a virtual broadcaster from Earth, Kizuna AI fell into a deep sleep inside of a disc when the planet was destroyed, until one day she found herself in the hands of Yuna, who rebooted her. She hopes to continue learning more about Humans through her new broadcasts on Orbis.

description.en: Hello, everyone! An entertainer forever full of energy
Attacks by firing a heart at the enemy, before dispelling a debuff from an ally. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Dispels a debuff from all allies.

description.en: Heals the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Cheers on allies, granting a barrier to all allies for 3 turns, before granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Cheers on allies, granting increased Attack and a barrier to all allies for 3 turns, before granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.

story.en: A member of Armin's Longtail Company, Kluri's only goal is to earn money to live a decent life. She hates anything that's tedious. Having left Dun Blyraia at a young age, she is unaware she is an Elf.

description.en: A mercenary doing the bare minimum to earn her paycheck
Strikes in the direction of the enemy, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Recovers {{variable}} Health of the caster at the beginning of every turn.
Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.
Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Greetings, my name is Kraureit Roheil.

story.en: One of the Knights of Taranor, Krau's outgoing and confident personality often causes people to misunderstand his intentions, but he tends to silently push ahead with what he thinks is right. He is risking everything he has to fight for the future of his homeland.

description.en: A self-confident and forward-looking knight
Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to --provoke-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Shoves the enemy with a shield, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}, before granting ++increased Defense++ to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the **caster's lost Health**, **penetrating** Defense. This attack **cannot trigger a critical hit**.

Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the **caster's lost Health**, **penetrating** Defense. Also grants a ++barrier++ to the caster for 2 turns, with strength proportional to the **caster's max Health**. This attack **cannot trigger a critical hit**.

name.en: Grace of the Vast Ocean Tide

description.en: A shield touched by a Guardian's breath. Krau's shield is full of traces of fierce battles he has fought.
Increase Swordstorm's chance to --provoke-- by 25%.
++Increase Speed++ of the caster for 2 turns when using Charge.
When an enemy is defeated by Summon Ziegfried, **decrease cooldown** of this skill by 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Landy, Politiaâ€™s chief of police. If you notice anyone suspicious or have a lead for me, don't hesitate to let me know!

story.en: A woman of principles who works hard to do what's best for her city. As she is an older model, she lacks a few functions, but she has great durability. She adores Flan like her own little sister.

description.en: Politia's Chief of Police in charge of maintaining public order
Fires at the enemy and **increases the caster's Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}. Combat Readiness increase and amount of Fighting Spirit gained are doubled when the enemy is buffed.

name.en: The Chief Is on the Scene

description.en: Increases the caster's Attack by {{variable}} after attacking. This effect can only stack up to 3 times. At the start of the turn, gains 10 Fighting Spirit for each buff granted to an enemy, and when Fighting Spirit is full, **resets skill cooldown**. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit.

Fires at **all enemies** and grants all allies ++increased Speed++ for 2 turns, before **increasing their Combat Readiness** by 15%. When Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to **penetrate** the target's Defense by 50%.

Fires at **all enemies** and grants all allies ++increased Speed++ for 2 turns, before **increasing their Combat Readiness** by 15%. When Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to **penetrate** the target's Defense by 50%. This skill **cannot trigger a counterattack**.

get_line.en: Krau, code number: 00. Standing by.

story.en: Leader of the Mechanical Empire Taranor's Special Force Team 7 and Heir to the mobile weapon Ziegfried. He's uncontrollable and does everything his way, but his skill is undeniable. Central Division has granted him the code number 00 as a symbol of his right to act independently.

description.en: A wild card capable of handling anything
Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, before ++increasing Speed++ of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

After suffering an attack that targets all allies, **decreases the caster's skill cooldown** by 1 turn and grants a ++barrier++ to all allies for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Barrier effect can only be activated once per turn.

Summons Ziegfried and attacks **all enemies**. **Penetrates** Defense, but **cannot trigger a critical hit**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Summons Ziegfried and attacks **all enemies**, before granting ++immunity++ to all allies for 2 turns. **Penetrates** Defense, but **cannot trigger a critical hit**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

get_line.en: It's a big world filled with strong people. That's what makes life fun.

story.en: Daughter of a family of sorcerers from Witchaven, the wandering fighter Hataan taught her martial arts and of the outside world as he passed through the city. After he left she lost interest in magic and worked to hone her fighting skills alone. Unsatisfied, she eventually left Witchaven as well to find Hataan and become his disciple.

description.en: An optimistic fighter who just stepped foot into the world
Attacks with a strong fist, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

get_line.en: I am the aspiring warrior, Leontius Leo! And this is my friend, Racoo! Nice to meet you.

story.en: Born to a family of scholars, Leo grew up learning much of warriors and myth. He is bravely traveling with his pet and good friend Racoo, in hope of realizing his dream of becoming a warrior himself.

description.en: A trouble making joker who dreams of becoming the ultimate warrior
Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.
Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 50% chance to use Sparrow Dive.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn.
Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, decreasing Speed for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to stun.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you. I'm Lidica.

story.en: Expelled from the Rose Apostles, she joined the Phantom CIC to investigate the Land of Death. She wanted to defeat the Unknown and instill faith unto others. However, her rough personality still causes problems within the Phantom CIC.

description.en: A hot-tempered member of the Phantom CIC, hunting Unknown
Attacks with a sword, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 10%.
Attacks with a sword, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 10%. When the enemy is debuffed, **decreases Combat Readiness** by an additional 10%.
Attacks **all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance each to --decrease Hit Chance-- for 1 turn, make them --unhealable-- for 1 turn, and **dispel one buff**.

Attacks the enemy with a whip sword, **decreasing buff durations** by 1 turn, before **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 100% and --decreasing Speed-- for 2 turns. Grants the caster ++skill nullifier++ once, negating damage received from the next skill attack.
Increase damage dealt by Wild Rose by 20%.
Increase Wild Rose's base **decrease Combat Readiness** amount by 5%.
Increase Rosebush **dispel buff** amount by 1.
"That's it! If I wear a dress instead of armor they will be caught off guard, and I'll have the perfect opening to attack first. I'm a genius!"

get_line.en: I'm Lilias, of the Perlutia family. I'm sure you've heard of us.

story.en: Trained from birth to be citylord, Lilias is a descendant of the royal family of Perlutia, a kingdom that once ruled the entire continent of Cidonia. She is passionate about becoming the best leader possible for Perland and supports harmony with other cities, but behind all of that lies a deeper ambition.

description.en: Ambitious Citylord of Perland
Takes the lead and attacks, triggering a **Dual Attack** from a random ally. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
Deploys a divine weapon, granting a ++barrier++ to the caster for 2 turns, before a {{variable}} chance to --provoke-- the enemy for 2 turns.

Commands the Perland Army to fire on **all enemies**, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 25% and inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack. **Increases the caster's Combat Readiness** by 50%.

**Dispels all debuffs** from all allies and commands the Perland Army to fire on **all enemies**, **decreasing Combat Readiness** by 25% and inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack. Increases the **caster's Combat Readiness** by 50%.

get_line.en: You've been looking for me? Who do you want me to cut?

story.en: Originally born into a tailor family on the planet Rekos, she was raised by mercenaries after losing her parents in a civil war, and became a wandering swordswoman. Until she met Straze, the Black Knight, and her life changed forever.

description.en: Mercenary of Rekos who wanted to be a tailor
Strikes and slices the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to make them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns.
Brutally cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict three --bleeding-- effects for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%.

Brutally cuts the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict three --bleeding-- effects for 2 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%. When the target is bleeding after the attack, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by an additional 50%.

Slashes the enemy with Cho & Mal, before granting the caster ++skill nullifier++ once. When the enemgr is defeated, inflicts **extinction** an **decreases the casterâ€˜s skill cooldown** by 1 turn. **Hit Chance is increased** by 20% when using this skill.
A medal bestowed only to the most talented of tailors. As it is a family heirloom, Lilibet received it from her mother, with whom she has been separated from childhood.
Increases damage dealt by Slice-Slice by 20%.
**Dispels two debuffs** from the caster before the skill effect when using Snip-Snip.
Increases damage dealt by Soul Cutter by 10%.

get_line.en: Die on the battlefield, or conquer the world... It's a fifty-fifty shot. Are you ready to bet it all on the gamble of a lifetime?

story.en: A conqueror who has been nicknamed the Golden Lioness. However, the secret truth behind her conquest of the continent is that she gambled away the nation's funds and ended up conquering the entire continent after a series of conquests in an attempt to replenish the national treasury. Later, she hears of the legend of the Dark Witch and embarks on a journey with curiosity and the desire for conquest.

description.en: A great conqueror who mastered both magic and swordsmanship
Attacks the enemy with a sword and ++increases Speed++ of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's Defense**.

Gains 40 Fighting Spirit at the start of the first battle. After an ally suffers an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, **dispels all debuffs** inflicted on the caster and activates Shine!. The effect after being attacked can only be activated once every {{variable}} turns.
Shines: Emits light, ++increasing Defense++ and ++Effect Resistance++ of the caster for 2 turns, and gains 50 Fighting Spirit.
Attacks **all enemies** with a swordstorm. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **casterâ€˜s Defense**.

Attacks **all enemies** with a sword storm, before granting an **extra turn** to the caster. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's Defense**.

get_line.en: I will protect everyone!

story.en: A young queen who is strong and full of kindness. She leads her people with a mature, wise demeanor. The people of Solayu previously had complaints about the Lady of La Mare, but their feelings are slowly being changed by their lady's changed behavior.

description.en: An elegant young queen who showed up to protect her land
Attacks with a giant sword before granting the caster ++immunity++ for 1 turn.

**Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit** by 30%. **Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit for all allies** except for the caster by {{variable}}. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the moment the caster suffers a critical hit, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 15%.

Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. When the target is a Dark elemental Hero, increases damage dealt and inflicts **additional damage** proportional to the **caster's Attack to all enemies** except for the target.

Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks, **recovering Health proportional to damage dealt**. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. When the target is a Dark elemental Hero, increases damage dealt and inflicts **additional damage** proportional to the **caster's Attack to all enemies** except for the target.
She dons this fancy outfit when she's out to patrol her territory. This regal outfit is tailored to be as comfortable as possible while still befitting a queen.

get_line.en: Please, call me Lorina.

story.en: An apprentice of the Order of the Shield, Lorina is constantly practicing to achieve her goal of becoming a knight. She thinks she's clever and confident, but in reality she's quite naive and easily tricked by others.

description.en: She may look skilled, but she's useless! An Order of the Shield apprentice
Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear.
Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.
Increases Attack by {{variable}} each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Jumps into the air and strikes down at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

get_line.en: I'm Lots, I'll do whatever you need.

story.en: Originally a part of the Order of the Blue Cross, Lots was dispatched to Reingar, where he studied healing magic. Wanting to test his abilities and find a rare magical item, he has left on a journey.

description.en: A valiant healer searching for a rare magical item
Attacks with a light sphere, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

Uses healing magic to recover Health and increase Combat Readiness by {{variable}} of ally, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 30%. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Uses strengthening magic to recover Health, increase Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, and grant continuous healing for 2 turns to all allies.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 2 turns.

description.en: Uses strengthening magic to recover Health, increase Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, and grant continuous healing for 3 turns to all allies.

get_line.en: Don't worry. If you just do what I say, you can have everything your heart desires.

story.en: A mysterious woman who plays a part in most incidents in Natalon, Lua is the true leader of the Hand of Revolution and holds influence over many factions. Although she appeared throughout history for a longtime, no one knows where she came from or what her goal is.

description.en: The alluring tactician who spreads a frgotten chaos
Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy with light, **dispelling two buffs** before putting them to --sleep-- for 1 turn.
Attacks the enemy with light, **dispelling two buffs** before putting them to --sleep-- for 1 turn. Grants an **extra turn** to the caster.
**Dispels one buff** from all enemies before **increasing skill cooldowns** by 1 turn and inflicting --beguile--. ++Increases Speed++ of all allies for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Hi! I'm Lucy, the newest member of the Student Council. Just let me know if there's anything I can do to help!

story.en: A new member of the Student Council, Lucy was recruited to assist Hazel, who has grown tired of her excessive workload and all the preparations she must carry out for various events. Initially, Lucy was only helping out with paperwork, but thanks to the scheming of Yuna and Carrot, she was also selected as an ambassador for the Student Council. She also works as a recordkeeper in the Archive Management Department.

description.en: The Student Council's newest mascot who loves recordkeeping
Throws paper to attack the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to restrict for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies, with a {{variable}} chance each to restrict and decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Uses many sheets of paper to grant a barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Uses many sheets of paper to grant a barrier to all allies for 2 turns before decreasing debuff durations by 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: Fine. I am Ludwig, the final Nocturne.

story.en: Ludwig is the sole survivor of the Nocturnes, the family responsible for protecting the Lunar Cemetery. He cherishes the Guardian Kromcruz more than anyone else. Though he might look young, he is well along in years.

description.en: The sole survivor of the Nocturnes
Attacks with magic, before a {{variable}} chance to **steal** one buff. **Increases the caster's Combat Readiness** by 15% when the caster is buffed after attacking.

Attacks the enemy with light, **decreasing buff durations** by 1 turn before a {{variable}} chance to --stun-- for 1 turn. Grants the caster ++invincibility++ for 1 turn. After the attack, when the target is stunned, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%.

Attacks **all enemies** with Nocturne magic, and when an enemy is defeated, **extends the caster's buff durations** by 1 turn. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 30%. When the caster is ++invincible++, **penetrates** the target's Defense by an additional 15%.

Attacks **all enemies** with Nocturne magic, and when an enemy is defeated, **extends the caster's buff durations** by 1 turn. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 30%. When the caster is ++invincible++, **penetrates** the target's Defense by an additional 30%.
A gemstone Nocturnes use to make their amulets. The hardness of the stone symbolizes an unshakable mind.
Increases damage dealt by Moonlight Blow by 10%.
When the target is an Ice elemental Hero, --decreases Defense-- for 2 turns after using Moonlight Blow.
Increases damage dealt by Call of the Full Moon by 10%.

get_line.en: I'm Luluca! Unrivaled throughout the universe!

story.en: An Alien girl who traveled across the universe seeking revenge against Straze for bringing ruin to her world. She's determined to make Straze pay for what he has done to her friends and restore her homeworld.

description.en: A shaman of Rekos who crossed the universe for revenge
Attacks with intense elemental force, with a 50% chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the **enemy's lost Health**.
With the blessing of the stars, grants ++increased Defense++ and ++barrier++ to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**.
Attacks **all enemies** with the power of ruin, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns.
Attacks **all enemies** with the power of ruin, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Attack. Increased Attack can stack up to 3 times.
A physical manifestation of the power gained through communion with the Spirits. Its form and nature change as needed.
Increases Wild Wave's chance to --decrease Defense-- by 15%.
Has a 35% chanceto grant an **extra attack** with the same skill when using Wild Wave. Extra attack can only be granted once per turn of the caster.
Has a 75% chance to --decrease Attack-- of all enemies for 2 turns when using Wave of Vengeance.
"Baking is all about patience, strength, and meticulous planning! I, Luluca, will teach you all about it!"

get_line.en: My destiny, my loyalty, my horns... I offer them all to you.

story.en: Luna is a half-Dragon, half-Human knight that has been loyal to Wintenberg since the time of Queen Francesca. Only a few know of the true feelings hidden behind her smile.

description.en: Half-Dragon of Wintenberg seeking vengeance
Stabs the target a random number of times. Skill **cooldown decreases** by 1-3 turns and damage dealt increases according to the number of attacks.

soul_description.en: Increases the number of attacks to max.

description.en: Increases Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit Resistance by {{variable}}. Increases Attack by {{variable}} when the caster's Health is 50% or more, and increases Defense by {{variable}} when the caster's Health is less than 50%.

Soars into the air and hits the enemy with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. Acquires **5 additional Souls** when the enemy is defeated.

Soars into the air and hits the enemy with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50% and attacks using **advantageous element**. Acquires **5 additional Souls** when the enemy is defeated.
Jewelry that Luna's father passed on to her. It is the only thing her mother left behind when she left.
**Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 15% after using Infinity Slash.
--Decreases Attack-- of the enemy for 2 turns after using Ragnar Spear.
When the enemy is defeated with Ragnar's Spear, grants an **extra turn** to the caster.

story.en: After resolving a problem in a Taranor laboratory, Doris became a magic scholar to continue her father's research. Although she's completely buried in work, she's content now that she's found her life's purpose.

description.en: A curious girl continuing her family's research
Attacks with light energy, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Dispels one debuff from an ally with light magic, before recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 35%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Dispels one debuff from an ally with light magic, before recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: Hi, hi! I'm this maid cafe's queen, Chloe!

story.en: "You could be the queen of our store!" -- Enticed by such a suggestion, Chloe began working in a maid cafÃ©, but with no idea what kind of work a maid is expected to do, she lacks a certain care for her customers.

description.en: Clueless Queen of a maid cafe
Attacks with a hammer, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. When the target is stunned after the attack, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 15%.

Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 20%. At the start of the turn, recovers Health of the two allies with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health. Dispels two debuffs from all living allies and grants revive for 3 turns.

Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health. Dispels two debuffs from all living allies and grants revive for 3 turns, before increasing Attack of all allies for 3 turns.

get_line.en: I'll teach you how strong I am.

story.en: In his goal of becoming the strongest in the universe, he is hunting down and challenging every martial arts master he can find. He will cross time and space, and even dimensions, to find a worthy challenger.

description.en: A boy heading for greatness
Batters the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

Has a 30% chance to counterattack when attacked, with a 100% chance to counterattack with Dragon Flame after suffering a critical hit.
Dragon Flame (Acquire 1 Soul): Makes a critical hit, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health. This attack receives effects that are applied to the basic skill.
Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increase Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4041_gacha_get)

story.en: Hazel disguised herself to recruit more members for the student council. Only a few know her true identity, and once she's finished with her business, she returns to her original appearance.

description.en: A pretty girl with stunning beauty
Attacks with fire magic, with a {{variable}} chance to make unhealable for 2 turns.

Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Amount recovered is doubled when the target's Health is 50% or less.

Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 1 turn, before recovering Health of all allies and dispelling one debuff. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 2 turns, before recovering Health of all allies and dispelling one debuff. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

get_line.en: Oh, you were looking for me? Thank you!

story.en: An apprentice knight of the Order of the Shield, Maya boasts incredible arm strength. Finding great value in her work protecting people, she devoted herself to the Order of the Shield. She cares greatly for her family back home.

description.en: A young knight with a strong arm and shield
Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Attacks with a shield, with a {{variable}} chance each to stun for 1 turn before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke all enemies for 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns.
Has a {{variable}} chance to provoke all enemies for 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns.

get_line.en: This path... This is the fate I choose.

story.en: Mediator Kawerik roams Cidonia restoring the destroyed balance of the land's Spirits. He may have passively accepted his fate for the time being, but deep down, he hopes that he'll one day return to his ordinary life with the person he loves.

description.en: A lone wanderer who sacrificed his own life

Dashes toward the enemy to attack, increasing Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Attacks the enemy with the mediator's power, decreasing Attack for 2 turns and granting a barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Barrier strength increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Restores balance that has been destroyed, dispelling all debuffs from all allies and increasing Attack for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Restores balance that has been destroyed, dispelling all debuffs from all allies and granting increased Attack and immunity for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Will you join me on my quest for vengeance? For the revival of the Bloodrose family.

story.en: A Vampire who dreams of revenge after losing everything. Originally the eldest daughter of a noble family, she fell in love with a Vampire she met at a ball and soon became a Vampire herself. After a long separation following an ambush, she was enraged to discover her love had betrayed her. Though he had since died, that won't stop her exacting her revenge on his son.

description.en: A Vampire betrayed by her lover, crossing the ocean to take her revenge
Overpowers the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to make them --unhealable-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's lost Health**.

Attacks by unleashing their inner rage, before granting ++immortality++ and ++immunity++ to the caster for 1 turn. This skill's **cooldown is reset** when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's lost Health**.

**Dispels all buffs** from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression, --cursing-- for 2 turns **regardless** of whether the **attack hits**. This skill is **unaffected by elemental disadvantage**. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.

**Dispels all buffs** from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression. This skill is **unaffectected by elemental disadvantage** and grants an **extra turn** to the caster. --Curses-- the enemy for 2 turns **regardless** of whether the **attack hits**. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.
A coffin infused with the condensed power of the Vampire Lord. The deep darkness will not allow even the faintest stream of light.
Absorbs some of the **damage dealt as Health** when using Might.
Increases damage dealt by Manifestation by 10%.
When an enemy is defeated by Manifestation, ++increases Attack++ of all allies except for the caster for 1 turn.

get_line.en: If that is your will, I will obey.

story.en: A Homunculus placed in the care of Queen Diene some years previously, Mercedes has a poker face that gives away little emotion, but she grows quickly attached to those who show her kindness. Sometimes, she may awkwardly mimic others or repeat what they say.

description.en: A blank-faced Homunculus chosen by The Last Spellbook
Attacks two enemies with shock magic.

Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere. If used when there are three or fewer enemies, activates Dimensional Rupture again, and damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer. When activated this way, Dimensional Rupture deals decreased damage, and can only be activated once.
Releases the power of the Ancient Book to attack all enemies, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.
Releases the power of the Ancient Book to strongly attack all enemies, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.

get_line.en: MISSING_TRANSLATION_VALUE(c4023_gacha_get)

story.en: Initially skeptical of Gunther's kindness, Helga eventually came to realize his sincerity. At his suggestion, she joins his mercenary company, but is flustered to learn she is the only member.

description.en: An unruly mercenary trusting in justice
Attacks the enemy with an axe, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Encourages all allies, increasing Attack and Effectiveness of all allies for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: I'm Milim Nava, a Demon Lord with the nickname, "Destroyer"!

story.en: A Dragonoid who hates boredom because she lived a long life. She and Rimuru became friends as Rimuru brought her endless entertainment.

description.en: The Destroyer who brings ruin and destruction upon all.
Attacks the enemy, **recovering Health** proportional to damage dealt before ++increasing Attack++ of the caster for 1 turn.

At the start of battle and at the end of the turn, has a {{variable}} chance to grant ++Dragon Eye (Milim Eye)++ to the caster for 1 turn. When the caster is granted ++Dragon Eye (Milim Eye)++ at the start of the turn, **dispels stealth** from all enemies. **Ignores Effect Resistance**. When Focus is full after attacking, consumes all Focus to activate Dragon Buster.
Dragon Buster: **Attacks all** enemies with overwhelming mana, **removing 10 Souls**.
Releases mana to attack the enemy, inflicting **extinction** when the enemy is defeated. ++Increases Evasion++ of the caster for 3 turns.

Releases mana to attack the enemy, inflicting **extinction** when the enemy is defeated. ++Increases Evasion++ of the caster for 3 turns. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, **damage sharing** effects are **ignored**.

collaboration_ip.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

get_line.en: The desert taught me that nothing is forever and nothing truly disappears.

story.en: A mercenary and adventurer constantly going back and forth between Savara and the Great Desert, Mirsa's main business is treasure hunting. A child of nomads, she has no fixed home. Finding old ruins in the desert is one of her favorite things.

description.en: A cool treasure hunter shining within a sandstorm
Attacks with dual-wielded swords, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Increases Evasion Chance by {{variable}}. At the moment the caster is attacked, if the caster successfully evades, decreases cooldown of the caster by 1 turn and increases Speed for 2 turns.
Ambushes the target, silencing them for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.
Ambushes the target, silencing them for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

get_line.en: I'm... always sad.

story.en: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings songs of a passion frozen by painful betrayal. She is known to mercilessly tear things apart with her bare hands.

description.en: A cold-blooded Banshee with an ice-cold scream
Claws the enemy, absorbing some of the damage to heal all allies.
Casts a spell at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and decrease Attack for 2 turns.
Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies.
Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies. When the enemy is defeated, grants revive for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health.

get_line.en: It's me, Montmorancy! It'll all work out... eventually! Yes!

story.en: An apprentice sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Montmorancy is an understudy of Achates and Clarissa, the latter of which she likes very much. She is naive and often makes mistakes, but overcomes them with a positive attitude.

description.en: A naive and hardworking apprentice nun
Attacks the enemy with water energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.
Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

soul_description.en: Effect is granted to all allies.

description.en: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, while increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

get_line.en: *chuckling* Welcome, distinguished guest. It is I, the great Mortelix. But you, you can call me Mort.

story.en: An ancient Dragon who always carries an air of gentility and relaxation that belies his capricious and egotistical nature. Tired of his dull life, he wants nothing more than to find an adversary worthy of calling a rival. Likewise, he tends to grow obsessed anytime he encounters someone he finds interesting.

description.en:
An ancient Dragon
in search of a worthy rival
Pierces the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. **Ignores Effect Resistance** when the caster is ++enraged++.

Pierces the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns. **Ignores Effect Resistance** when the caster is ++enraged++. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Immune to --stun-- and --sleep--. Has a 30% chance to counterattack when attacked. If the caster inflicts a critical hit when using a basic skill, has a {{variable}} chance to activate Sacred Blessing. Sacred Blessing can be activated once every 2 turns.
Sacred Blessing: ++Increases Critical Hit Resistance++ of all allies for 1 turn and ++increases Speed++ of the caster for 2 turns.

Descends and attacks **all enemies**, inflictindg **injuries**. The caster becomes ++enrage++ for 2 turns and **recovers Health**. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the **caster's max Health**. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 20% every time this skill is used.
The spear that Mort always wields. Its bluish glow grows brighter as Mort's rage intensifies.
Increases Extermination's chance to --decrease Defense-- by 10%.
Extends buff duration of Sacred Blessing's ++increased Critical Hit Resrstance++ by 1 turn.
Increases damage dealt by Advent: Mortelix by 10%.

get_line.en: Right or wrong, I'll worry about that later!

story.en: Living carefree as the leader of a group of thieves, Mucacha turned over a new leaf after meeting Cecilia and began an honest life as a follower of Corvus. He cherishes loyalty.

description.en: A reformed thief, descended from Angara

story.en: A singer-songwriter who also serves as vocalist, instrumentalist, songwriter, and producer for the duo Maid Kingdom. She's wearing a maid costume for the sake of the band's image, but she doesn't know much about maids, so she feels a little awkward.

get_line.en: Operator Sigret. At your service.

story.en: An Android created by the Homunculus rebel organization using forbidden Lost Technology. Though she was created to destroy the world, in the process of seizing her from the enemies, Krau was registered in her system as an administrator, and as a result, Operator Sigret was assigned to Special Force Team 7. At first she was merely a machine with no emotions, but as she embarks on more missions with Krau, she's beginning to develop her own personality.

Attacks the enemy with a scythe, before healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

He is incredibly loyal to Perland, the largest city in Cidonia, for providing his previously nomadic family with safety, and is frequently trusted with important missions for the Raiders.

story.en: The sole survivor of a tribe that was annihilated by an alliance of other tribes. Peira grew up with Arunka and considers her to be her sister, but she drinks from the Goblet of Oath to avenge her tribe and leaves the Prairie with her followers. Soon, she conquers the North that has long been segregated and builds the Khan Empire, a country of the Suin.
