Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.
Attacks with a slingshot, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.

Fires a shockbomb at the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to increase skill cooldown by 1 turn. Decreases skill cooldown of Go, Racoo! by 1 turn. At the end of the turn, detonates bombs inflicted on the enemy.
Attacks all enemies with Racoo, with a {{variable}} chance each to decrease Speed and plant a bomb for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I see the source of your radiant light...

story.en: A shaman of Rekos and Luluca's friend. Born with the Vigilant Eye, she is able to perceive the true nature of other beings. She visited Straze to confess her feelings for him, but in a tragic twist of fate, she was killed at his hand.

description.en: A tragic shaman who sees others' true natures
Attacks the enemy with a noble power, granting a ++barrier++ to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

soul_description.en: Grants a ++barrier++ to all allies for 2 turns after attacking.

description.en: **Recovers Health** of all allies when an ally is attacked by an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, and **increases Combat Readiness** of all allies by 5% each per attacked ally. Amount recovered is proportional to the **caster's max Health** and the number of attacked allies.
With the grace of Rekos, grants a ++barrier++ and ++revive++ to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

With the grace of Rekos, **recovers the Health** of all allies and grants a ++barrier++ and ++revive++ for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

get_line.en: Pleased to meet you.

story.en: Knight Commander of Lefundos, situated in Eureka the Northern Continent. Romann has no desire to be king despite being the cousin and successor of the current king, Schniel. Cynical and assertive, yet weak to affection.

description.en: Knight Commander of Lefundos, a sharp-tongued cynic
Shoots gravity arrows at the enemy,Â decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}, and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}.
Attacks all enemies with a magic circle, with a 50% chance each to decrease Combat Readiness by {{variable}} four times.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. Damage dealt increases when the enemy is buffed.

Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. When the enemy is buffed, damage dealt increases and the enemy is inflicted with two poison effects for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by an additional 30%.

get_line.en: Though I may be lacking, I will do my best!

story.en: A quiet and kind young canine Suin of the Itan Clan, despite struggling to feed even himself, Roozid makes sure the sandcats of the Great Desert do not starve either. He admires Cartuja greatly.

description.en: A kind warrior of the Itan Clan who takes care of the sandcats
Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Attacks with a swordstorm, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Corrects stance, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}}.
Corrects stance, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}} and increasing their Speed for 2 turns.

get_line.en: So? I'm confident I can take you down. Do you want to spar with me?

story.en: A close aide of Cecilia's, Rose followed her all the way from Wintenberg. She loves to fight and has a good sense of humor. Her belief is that the strongest warrior die with no regrets.

description.en: Winning is the only way to survive! A warlike protector

Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn when the caster's Health is 50% or more, and increases Defense of the caster for 1 turn when the caster's Health is less than 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

Covers an ally with the Shield of Light, dispelling two debuffs and granting a barrier for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense.
Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 1 turn, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

description.en: Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Grants increased Defense to the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm on a path to transform my ideals into reforms. Would you care to join me?

story.en: The Flame Alchemist and a colonel of the Amestrian State Military. He is a remarkably talented officer who became a colonel at an early age. With a cool head and blazing ambition, he is a man devoted to achieving his goals by planning out precise strategies.

description.en: A cool-headed strategist with a fiery ambition

Attacks the enemy with flames, and **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 15%. When used on the caster's turn, if the caster is granted Flame Alchemist, activates Heat Wave instead of Ignite.
Heat Wave: Attacks the enemy with a huge flame, and **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 30%. **Penetrates** the target's Defense by 50%. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.
At the start of the first battle, **gains 40 Fighting Spirit** and grants ++Flame Alchemist++. Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed {{variable}} of max Health.
Attacks **all enemies** with a consecutive barrage of flames. and grants ++Flame Alchemist++ to the caster. When there are three or fewer enemies, **damage dealt increases with fewer enemies**.

After ++increasing Attack++ of the caster for 2 turns, **attacks all** enemies with a consecutive barrage of flames, and grants ++Flame Alchemist++ to the caster. When there are three or fewer enemies, **damage dealt increases with fewer enemies**.

get_line.en: Well, I'll do my best. I really will!

story.en: An Heir of the Sixth World, Ruele is revered for her kindness. She is a Soul Weaver who gained the favor of the Lord of Light, Destina. Her only hobby is telling fortunes with rabbit fortune cookies.

description.en: A gentle saint shining with blessed light

Attacks the enemy with a staff before healing the ally with the lowest Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, and amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

soul_description.en: Attacks the enemy before greatly healing all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.

description.en: Summons a light pillar, dispelling all debuffs from an ally before recovering their Health and granting them a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering 50% of their Health before granting them invincibility for 1 turn. When this skill is used on a living ally, all of the ally's debuffs will be dispelled before the same effect is applied.

Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering all of their Health before granting them invincibility for 1 turn. When this skill is used on a living ally, all of the ally's debuffs will be dispelled before the same effect is applied.

get_line.en: Great to meet you. I'm Baal Chanel, and this is my fiancÃ©e, Sezan Serzan.

story.en: Sage Baal fell in love with an ordinary Human named Sezan and locked her soul in a doll to preserve her for himself forever. However, as time passed her soul eroded away, and eventually, she became simply a normal doll.

description.en: An otherworldly romantic with all kinds of knowledge

Summons an evil spirit to attack the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to put the enemy to sleep for 1 turn. When the target is asleep after the attack, increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

Attacks all enemies by summoning storm clouds, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff and aÂ {{variable}} chance to put them to sleep. When this skill is available, increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} at the end of the enemy's turn.

Attacks with evil eyes. When the enemy is defeated, silences all remaining enemies for 1 turn. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

soul_description.en: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks with evil eyes. When the enemy is defeated, silences all remaining enemies for 1 turn, before recovering the caster to max Health. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

get_line.en: Shall I play with you since you summoned me?

story.en: A master of gunpowder weaponry, Schuri has a strong sense of pride and arrogance, though suffers a complex about his weak physical strength.

description.en: Brimming with confidence, it's the Explosive Gentleman
Attack the enemy with a pistol, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.
After delivering a critical hit, the caster gains 1 Focus, and the Combat Readiness of all allies except the caster is increased by {{variable}}.
Shoots all enemies with a rifle. When the caster's stacked Focus is 3 or more, this skill is enhanced into Full Burst. A successful attack with Full Burst always results in a critical hit.

Shoots all enemies with a rifle. When the caster's stacked Focus is 3 or more, this skill is enhanced into Full Burst. A successful attack with Full Burst always results in a critical hit, decreasing Combat Readiness of all enemies by 30%.

get_line.en: Sometimes it's important to get some rest. Only then can you be at the top of your game.

story.en: Bellona has come to Reingar to help Karin and the Public Security Club cope with the influx of summer visitors. Although she claims she's here to watch over Sez, it seems her true goal is to relax in the resort.

description.en: Ace of the Phantom CIC, brighter than the sun
Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a {{variable}} chance to --target-- the enemy for 1 turn.
Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a {{variable}} chance to --target-- the enemy for 2 turns.

**Redirects** 30% of **damage suffered** by the caster to the foremost ally. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The caster gains 1 Focus when an ally is attacked. When an ally is attacked and the caster's stacked Focus is 5, loses all Focus and activates You're Not Cute.
You're Not Cute: Attacks **all enemies** with a fan, with a 50% chance to --decrease Defense-- for 2 turns.
Attacks **all enemies** with a spray of water, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them --unable to be buffed-- and --unhealable-- for 2 turns. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.

get_line.en: Nice to meet you! I'm Senya. I've still got a lot to learn. I hope you'll lead me in the right direction!

story.en: Long ago, there was a little girl who lived in a small village in Wintenberg. After losing everything to a Dragon's attack, she swore she would get vengeance. Mort promised he would give her the power to achieve this, and under Mort's guidance, she learned how to kill Dragons.

description.en: The first person to kill a Dragon and first Dragon Knight
Attacks the enemy with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to --provoke-- for 1 turn. When it is not the caster's turn, effect chance increases by 25%.

Attack increases by 30% and Critical Hit Resistance increases by 35%. When attacking, **cannot trigger a critical hit**. When attacked, if the caster suffers a non-critical hit, deals damage to the attacker proportional to the caster's Attack before activating Grace of the Battlefield. Grace of the Battlefield can only be activated once every 2 turns.
Grace of the Battlefield: Grants a ++barrier++ to all allies for 2 turns, and ++increases Speed++ of the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength Increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Attacks **all enemies** by striking downwards with a spear and has a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Hit Chance-- for 2 turns and a {{variable}} chance to --provoke-- for 1 turn.

Attacks **all enemies** by striking downwards with a spear and has a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Hit Chance-- for 2 turns and a {{variable}} chance to --provoke-- for 1 turn. Adopts a ++counterattacking++ stance for 3 turns.
The pauldron that Mort granted to Senya. This pauldron shines as bright as lightning as the wearer's rage deepens.
**Recovers Health** of the caster after using Spear of Vengeance. Amount recovered increases proportional to the **caster's Attack**.
Increases Grace of the Battlefield's ++barrier++ strength by 20%.
Grants ++increased Attack (Greater)++ to the caster for 3 turns after using Dragon Slayer's Strike. (This effect is applied before adopting a counterattack stance)

get_line.en: Oh my, you were looking for me?

story.en: With her glamorous beauty and enchanting smile, she's the quintessential witch. She loves money, especially when using it to decorate herself with beautiful things. She doesn't go anywhere without her magical weapon, Chatty.

description.en: A glamorous witch who loves beautiful things
Attacks with a flame of seduction, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.
Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns.

Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns before recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, cooldown does not increase.
Swallows the enemy in the flame of Chatty, the magic lantern, with a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

get_line.en: What do you want from me...?

story.en: A cynical and quiet man, Sez Gaien is a living weapon known to many as "the Berserker." After gaining power from an Acolyte to escape the Homunculus experiments, he was branded a mass murderer and has been running ever since.

description.en: A living weapon, the cynical Berserker

Attacks the enemy with dark energy, with a 50% chance to make them --unhealable-- for 1 turn. After attacking, when the enemy's Health is 50% or less, activates Encroach as an **extra attack**. Encroach can only be activated once per turn, during the caster's turn.
Enoroach: Releases dark power to attack **all enemies**, with a 50% chance to make them --unhealable-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.

Attacks the enemy with dark energy, making them --unhealable-- for 1 turn. After attacking, when the enemy's Health is 50% or less, activates Encroach as an **extra attack**. Encroach can only be activated once per turn, during the caster's turn.
Enoroach: Releases dark power to attack **all enemies**, with a 50% chance to make them --unhealable-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.
Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed {{variable}} of max Health. After being attacked, grants ++stealth++ for 1 turn. Stealth can only be activated once per turn.

Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy. When the enemy is defeated, inflicts **extinction**, and deals **additional damage** proportional to the **caster's Attack** to all enemies except for the target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **target's lost Health**.
Sez has been sent to Reingar on a temporary assignment to help the Public Security Club. Despite being dressed like a lifeguard, don't expect him to even bat an eyelid if you start drowning.

get_line.en: Roseria Dart has been called to arms.

story.en: Rose was ready and willing to follow Cecilia anywhere, until she had her heart completely shattered. Now she is an obsessive and fiercely persistent war machine.

description.en: A protector walking the path of blood as a shadow of a precious thing

Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn when the target's Health is 50% or more, and a {{variable}} chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn when the target's Health is less than 50%.
Leaps into the air and strikes at the enemy with a swordstorm, dispelling one buff and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

description.en: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%. Increases Effectiveness of the caster for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%. Increases Effectiveness of the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Identifying which signs lead to the proper future and providing guidance accordingly. That is my duty.

story.en: A high shaman from a family that has been serving Theranhad's emperors since its founding. She has inherited the ability to foresee fragments of the near future. However, she feels guilty for not being able to protect the previous emperor and as thus pledged loyalty to the young emperor Zio.

description.en: A noble high shaman who executest the emperor's orders
Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict --venom-- for 1 turn. After attacking, when the target is inflicted with venom, **increases skill cooldowns** by 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance to 100% and inflicts venom for 2 turns.

description.en: At the end of an enemy's turn, for each buff granted to the enemy, has a 5% chance to **increase Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20%. At the end of the turn, grants a ++random buff++ and a ++barrier++ to the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
Attacks **all enemies**, **decreasing buff durations** by 1 turn before inflicting --venom-- for 2 turns. **Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%.
Attacks **all enemies**, **decreasing buff durations** by 1 turn before inflicting --decreased Speed-- and - venom-- for 2 turns. **Increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%.
Prayer beads worn by Sharun, the high shaman of the royal palace. They say it emits a mysterious light in the dark of then night.
With Just Trust Me's effect, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by an additional 5%.
Increases Just Trust Me's barrier strength by 15%.
Decreases cooldown of May You Perish by 1 turn.

get_line.en: A new friendship begins with a One! Two! Three! Ta-da!

story.en: At best, a free spirit, at worst, an irresponsible hedonist. Shooting Star Achates finds a life without stimulus meaningless, and is always on the lookout for trouble.

description.en: A whimsical and lovable wandering healer
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.
Revives a dead ally with recovery magic. When the target is not dead, casts two random buffs for 3 turns.
Revives a dead ally with recovery magic and grants immortality for 1 turn. When the target is not dead, grants immortality and two random buffs for 3 turns.

Dispels all debuffs from both the caster and target, and between the caster and the target, heals the ally with the lowest Health to the point that their Health matches the other, before healing further on top. Health matching effect is unaffected by healing buffs or debuffs. Additional healing increases proportional to the max Health of each ally.

get_line.en: MISSING

story.en: A talented princess gifted in household chores such as cooking and sewing.

description.en: A shrine maiden (Kennagi) who comprehends all of creation
Attacks the enemy by manipulating magicules and **recovers Health** of the caster. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

**Dispels two debuffs** from all allies and **redistributes Health** so that each ally has an equal Health ratio before granting a ++barrier++ for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

**Dispels two debuffs** from all allies and **redistributes Health** so that each ally has an equal Health ratio before granting a ++barrier++ for 3 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the **casterâ€˜s max Health**.
**Dispels two buffs** from all enemies with fluttering flower petals before a {{variable}} chance to put them to --sleep-- for 2 turns.

collaboration_ip.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

get_line.en: I will do whatever I can to assist you in achieving your goals.

story.en: Head of the Homunculus Unit, Sigret is a close friend of Friedrich's. She holds complicated feelings towards Mercedes, who resembles her past self.

description.en: An envious Homunculus searching for redemption
Attacks with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance each of inflicting two --bleeding-- effects for 2 turns.

Batters the enemy with a scythe, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them --unhealable-- and inflict --bleeding-- for 2 turns. When the enemy's Health is 50% or less after the attack, activates Sever as an **extra attack** with a 100% chance of inflicting --bleeding--.

Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. **Penetrates** Defense by 30%, with an additional 5% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts **extinction** when the enemy is defeated.

Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. **Penetrates** Defense by 30%, with an additional 10% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts **extinction** when the enemy is defeated.
The only gift Sigret has ever received. Though little more than a decoration, she wears it daily.
Increase damage dealt by Sever by 20%.
Increase Sever's chance of inflicting --bleeding-- by 20%
After using Smash, the Health condition to activate Sever's **extra attack** changes to 75%.

get_line.en: I love running with the wind!

story.en: A young Elf born in Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. At a young age Silk left the forest, meaning she knows little of her own race and her home. Her personality is bright and cheerful like a spring breeze.

description.en: A gentle Elf walking within the Eternal Wind
Shoots arrows at the enemy, decreasing their Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

Gains 1 Focus at the start of the turn, and consumes 1 Focus when attacked, increasing Combat Readiness by 15%. When the caster's stacked Focus is 2 or more, Single Shot is enhanced into Automatic Fire, increasing damage dealt.
Attacks all enemies with wind, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies with wind, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and granting increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

get_line.en: I'm Aramintha, commander of the Silver Blade Company.

story.en: Commander of Savara's legendary Silver Blade Company. What began as a small group of people who had nowhere else to go gradually became greater in size thanks to Aramintha's charismatic leadership.

description.en: Red scorpion of Savara who cuts through the sandstorms.
Attacks the enemy with an explosion of flame, with a {{variable}} chance to burn for 1 turn.

soul_description.en: Effect Chance increases to 100%, ignores Effect Resistance.

description.en:
Activates Flame Release when the enemy is burned after using Flame Friction.
Flame Release: Attacks all enemies with mystic fire energy, with a 60% chance to burn for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25%.
Drops a giant meteor to attack all enemies, making them unhealable for 2 turns, before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.
Drops a giant meteor to attack all enemies, making them unhealable for 2 turns and stunning for 1 turn, before a {{variable}} chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

get_line.en: Well, I suppose I don't have much choice. But this doesn't mean we're friends, got it?

story.en: Daughter of a high-ranking noble, she was inflicted with an incurable disease and left in the care of the Church of the Goddess to receive treatment. However, as her condition only continued to worsen over time and her family eventually cut off support, she became little more than a burden. Cursing her own fate and the false hope the Church gave her, she traveled to a place named in a forbidden book and met with a mysterious being. She was then reborn anew, filled with hatred towards the world and the Church of the Goddess.

description.en: A cruel young girl who hates the world and the Church of the Goddess
Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. When the caster is immortal, triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

soul_description.en: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Attack of the target for 2 turns.

description.en: When the caster is immortal, enemies cannot be revived and all allies recover Health every time an enemy dies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. Recovery effect can only be activated once per turn.
Whips up a vortex of darkness and loathing, granting immortality to the caster for 2 turns. Grants increased Attack to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns.
Whips up a vortex of darkness and loathing, granting immortality to the caster for 2 turns. Grants increased Attack and Speed  to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: You'd better do your best if you wish to live.

story.en: A Gear-killer and bounty hunter who roams the world capturing wanted criminals. He boasts incredible fighting power, and while capable of harnessing all elements, he mainly sticks to Fire. He has a blunt and harsh way of speaking and prefers to use actions over words.

description.en:
The Flame of Corruption
who scorches all enemies

Attacks an enemy with pillars of fire. Damage dealt increases when the enemy isn't buffed. Activates Roman Cancel when the caster's **Fighting Spirit** is 100 after attacking. Cannot be triggered by a counterattack.
Roman Cancel: Consumes all **Fighting Spirit** and **extends the duration of buffs** granted to the caster by 1 turn, before granting the caster an **extra turn**.

When an enemy uses a non-attack skill, **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20% and gains 20 **Fighting Spirit**. When suffering an attack that targets all allies, activates Volcanic Viper against the attacker. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack. Each effect can only be activated once every 2 turns.
Volcanic Viper (++Acquire 2 Soul++): Launches the enemy into the air and attacks repeatedly, inflicting --silence-- for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **enemy's max Health**.

Attacks with a strong punch, **dispelling all buffs**. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **enemy's max Health**. After attacking, inflicts additional damage regardless of whether the attack hits.

Attacks with a strong punch, **dispelling all buffs** before making them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **enemy's max Health**. After attacking, inflicts additional damage regardless of whether the attack hits.

get_line.en: Aw, have I been playing too hard to get? Maybe I should go outside... Huh?! Oh, w-what are you doing here?! Did you hear all that? H-Haha...

story.en: The owner of an ice castle in the Lone Tundra. Her daydreaming first began as a way to relieve her loneliness and boredom, but over time, it took on a life of its own, and now she lives entirely in a fantasy world of her own design.

description.en: An ice castle's owner who is waiting for her Prince Charming

Attacks the enemy with magic, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn. When used on the caster's turn, Pew, Pew, Pew! becomes an attack that targets all enemies. The changed attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Decreases the amount of Focus gained by the enemy by 100%. When the caster is buffed at the start of the turn, has a {{variable}} chance to grant daydream for 1 turn.
Decreases the enemy's buff durations by 1 turn before attacking with starlight, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends the duration of buffs granted to the caster by Boom! Starlight Fall! by 1 turn and grants an extra turn.

description.en: Decreases the enemy's buff durations by 1 turn before attacking with starlight, stunning for 1 turn before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns.

get_line.en: My name? Should I give you my nickname, or my real name? Well, I guess it doesn't make a difference to you.

story.en: An Automatic Doll that hacks into the city's information network and steals intel. Sonia is so competitive that she always ends up spending the entire day playing even the simplest games made to foster friendship among hackers.

description.en: A genius hacker from the Unregulated Area whose playground is Politia's information network
Attacks the enemy with cover fire, before granting a barrier to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Recovers the target's Health using a recovery cube. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

soul_description.en: Effect is granted to all allies.

description.en: Recovers the target's Health using a recovery cube and dispels two debuffs. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Uses an enhanced recovery cube to grant all allies immunity for 2 turns, before recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

get_line.en: I desire only one thing. Killing he who looks just like me.

story.en: Researchers who barely escaped with their lives from Sez's murderous rampage built a new living weapon modeled after him. This new weapon seeks to kill Sez to prove its superiority and worth.

description.en: A violent butcher who threatens Sez's life
Attacks with an iron mace, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. When the target is stunned after the attack, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 25%.
Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 60% chance to stun for 1 turn.
Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 60% chance to stun for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

Attacks with a light storm, inflicting extinction and resetting cooldown for this skill when the enemy is defeated. Penetrates Defense by 30%, or by 100% when the enemy is stunned. If this skill is available when an ally except for the caster is attacked, has a 20% chance to counterattack.

get_line.en: Now I shall force you into an eternal nightmare. Ahaha.

story.en: While searching for a form that she liked, Tenebria enjoyed destroying people's minds. Her greatest joy came from watching them die from the poison of her illusions.

description.en: A poisonous nightmare seeped in cruelty

Attacks with an explosion of poison energy, with a {{variable}} chance to inflict poison for 2 turns. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack. Attacks two enemies when Endless Nightmare is in cooldown.

When an ally capable of being attacked is still remaining, the caster cannot be selected as a target for attacks. Increases Attack and Defense of the caster by {{variable}} every time somebody dies. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies.

Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

get_line.en: Look at those kids running around havrng a blast. I guess I've got no choice but to join in to make sure nobody gets hurt!

story.en: Charlotte is on summer break with her friends. Although she's trying to act cool and composed while insisting that she isn't excited at all, she doesn't seem to realize that a truly disinterested person wouldnâ€˜t have come up with such a comprehensive vacation plan.

description.en: The Lady of La Mare. who keeps insisting she is "not excited" at all

Attacks the enemy with two meaty fish and has a {{variable}} chance to --decrease Defense-- for 1 turn. When activated as a **Dual Attack**, this attack changes into an attack that targets **all enemies**. The changed attack **does not trigger a counterattack**, and **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 20%.

soul_description.en: Attacks **all enemies**. This attack **does not trigger** a Dual Attack or **counterattack**.

At the start of the turn, when Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit, **dispelling all debuffs** before ++increasing Attack++ for 2 turns and **resetting skill cooldowns**.
Attacks the enemy with a pod of killer whales, --stunning-- or 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **target's lost Health**.
Attacks the enemy with a pod of killer whales, --stunning-- for 1 turn, before ++increasindg Speed++ of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **target's lost Health**.

get_line.en: Ever since we arrived, everyone's been a little too excited. We don't have time to mess around...

story.en: lseria is at Levulin beach for a summer vacation but she's finding it hard to unwind between Cermia, who keeps forgetting why she's supposed to be there an keeps trying to escape, and Alexa, who seems to have misjudged their relationship and is focused solely on keeping Cermia on her best behavior.

description.en: A gentle breeze over a white sandy beach
Attacks the enemy with swords, with a {{variable}} chance each to **dispel two debuffs**.

Suppressl: **Increases Combat Readiness** of all allies by 15% and plants a --bomb-- on two random enemies for 2 turns.
Attacks **all enemies** with swords of flowers, --decreasing Attack-- for 2 turns. At the end of the turn, **detonates** bombs inflicted on the enemy.

Attacks **all enemies** with swords of flowers, --decreasing Attack-- for 2 turns and ++increases Speed++ of the caster for 2 turns. At the end of the turn, **detonates** bombs inflicted on the enemy.

get_line.en: Nice to meet you, call me Surin.

story.en: Coming from the East with her sentient weapon Mann, Surin vaguely remembers the journey that brought her to Ritania, but nothing else. Following Mann's voice, she embarks on a journey to find her lost memories.

description.en: A calm and composed warrior from the East
Attacks with a chain axe. When the enemy is bleeding, causes two bleeding effects for 2 turns.
Batters the enemy with a chain axe and inflicts two bleeding effects for 2 turns, decreasing Attack for 1 turn.

Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of bleeding effects inflicted on the enemy, and debuff duration is extended by 1 turn. Additionally, the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 15% per every bleeding effect inflicted on the enemy. Effect can only be applied up to 5 times.

get_line.en: Look forward to what I have to offer!

story.en: The leader of Wetheric Moor's new Strongman Company, Sven is straightforward and outgoing, with a goal to keep getting stronger. A hot-blooded young man who is likely training even now.

description.en: A native of Wetheric Moor, and leader of a new mercenary company

Attacks with dual-wielded swords, and when the caster's Health is 50% or less, activates Repelling Blow as an extra attack. Repelling Blow can only be activated once per turn of the caster.
Repelling Blow (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks the enemy repeatedly with dual-wielded swords. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

Grants immortality for 1 turn and increased Attack for 2 turns when the caster receives lethal damage.
Can only be activated once every {{variable}} turn(s).

Attacks all enemies and inflicts huge damage. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

get_line.en: Your fate had been settled the moment you stopped me.

story.en: A coldhearted child of darkness who eliminates everything standing in his way. He is collecting the Four Seasons Swords while cooperating with the Hand of Revolution, but no one truly knows his reason for doing so.

description.en: He will give up everything to protect the one thing most precious to him.

Attacks the enemy with a spear and **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's Speed**. When the caster is enraged, activates Tidal Crash as an **extra attack**. Tidal Crash can only be activated once per turn, during the caster's turn.
Tidal Crash: Attacks the enemy by slashing downwards with a spear. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's Speed**.

soul_description.en: Increase damage dealt by Full Moon Slash.

Attacks **all enemies**, **dispelling all buffs**, and **increases skill cooldowns** of the target with the highest Attack by 1 turn twice. Grants ++increased Attack++ and Speed to the caster for 2 turns. When the caster is ++enraged++, **ignores Effect Resistance**.

get_line.en: Twinkle twinkle! I'll be your star in the darkness!

story.en: An idol that brings joy and cheer through her electrifying music. She has great magical talent and can harness magic with her voice. She changes her appearance on stage with the Blooming Pendant and becomes more dynamic and lively.

(Tamarinne) Attacks an enemy with a serene melody and **heals** the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health. **Decreases cooldown** of Shining Starâ˜† by 1 turn.
(Idol) Attacks **all enemies** with a beautiful voice, **dispelling all buffs**. Triggers a **Dual Attack** from the ally with the highest Attack.

description.en:
(Tamarinne) **Heals** all allies with a peaceful melody. Amount recovered increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**. **Decreases cooldown** of Shining Starâ˜† by 1 turn.

Tamarinne's stage costume for her third official concert, inspired by the sea of light sticks she sees before her when she stands on stage.

get_line.en: Salute! I vow to follow your every order!

story.en: A member of the Taranor Guard. Unafraid of death, they will obey any order.

description.en: A brave guard protecting Taranor

get_line.en: Leave everything to me.

story.en: Soldiers responsible for guarding the King and Taranor Royal Palace, even as the energy of rebellion flows throughout Taranor, they remain faithfully loyal.

description.en: For Taranor! A soldier following any royal command

With the help of a knight from Taranor she was able to adapt to this new life and now strives to pay back that favor.

story.en: An Acolyte who freely deals out all kinds of illusions, Tenebria is known as the Phantom Queen. She bewilders her targets by overwhelming them with terrifying illusions or by taking on the appearance of others. Though she may look playful, she is monstrously cruel.

description.en: The Phantom Queen who deals in cruel illusions
Attacks the enemy with an explosion of dark energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to --sleep-- for 1 turn. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

Attacks the enemy with an explosion of dark energy, with a {{variable}} chance to put them to --sleep-- for 1 turn. When an enemy is put to --sleep--, the casterâ€˜s **Combat Readiness increases** by 50%. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

get_line.en: I look forward to working with you.

story.en: An adventurous woman, Tieria always chooses to travel in dangerous locations to satisfy her love for thrills. Her personality is calm and carefree, and she prefers to travel alone instead of dealing with other people. However, her beauty ensures she always attracts plenty of attention.

description.en: A carefree model fighting for her friends and the universe

Violet is turning heads with his new look, wich has made him more charming than ever. He's received more desserts than he knows what to do with.

get_line.en: May my magical power save you.

story.en: Granddaughter of a reclusive magical scholar, Vivian is gifted with incredible magical ability. As leader of Witchaven, she maintains a delicate balance between bickering factions of sorcerers, but the growing numbers of Unknown and machinations of political enemies have her treading on thin ice.

Yufine is on a picnic with her friends. She seems much moree interested in the lunch boxes than the flowers and keeps asking every five minutes when they're going to have lunch.

story.en: A Great Wicked who rules the Forsaken Lands. A lifetime ago, Yulha used to command Spirits with Beehoo, but somewhere along the line, she became a Wicked herself and instigated the Great War of Natalon. After the war, she was reborn as a new being, only to be defeated by Beehoo. Following her defeat, she fled to the Forsaken Lands and has been waiting for her chance ever since.

description.en: A ruler of the Wicked with vicious smile

He is often addressed as the imperial guardian as he only appears when something that might affect the empire's future occurs. A being shrouded in mystery, he has recently emerged once again from his long silence.

After finding out they share an enemy and a grudge, she joined the Chaos Sect and is now working with them to spread the word of Chaos. However, her personality is a poor match for the job, and now she is pondering how to fulfill her duties.

Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.
Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}} before decreasing Speed of the enemy for 2 turns and increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy, dispelling all buffs and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns, before increasing Attack and Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

soul_description.en: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

get_line.en: My name is Zeno. My destiny is to rule the universe.

story.en: An emperor from another galaxy who was defeated in a tournament held by Notos. He obsessed over power and life, eventually binding his soul with that of a star and becoming transcendent. He now heads toward Orbis in search of the Monolith.

description.en: A fanatical mage corrupted by endless desire
Attacks with thorns, with a {{variable}} chance to --stun-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.
When the enemy uses a non-attack skill, increases Defense of the caster and damage dealt by Ancient Beast by {{variable}}, and increases Effectiveness by 5%. Can stack up to 8 times.
Summons an ancient beast to attack **all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance to --silence-- for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

Summons an ancient beast to attack **all enemies**, with a {{variable}} chance to --silence-- for 1 turn, and inflicts --bleeding-- for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the **caster's max Health**.

get_line.en: Will I finally meet someone who can take me on?

story.en: The frost mage of Reingar, Zerato is the second son of a Spirit Weaver clan, blessed by Nixied, the Lord of Winter. He's a genius who hates to feel hot, and loves showing off. Like most Reingar students he pays no attention to those things he deems unimportant, and often crosses the line in his study of magic.

description.en: A genius frost mage who will freeze everything
Attacks an enemy with an ice pick, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.
Attacks the enemy repeatedly, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.
Attacks the enemy repeatedly, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.
Attacks all enemies with a giant iceberg, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn.

get_line.en: Let's not make our problems any worse than they already are... Can't we find a mutually beneficial solution?

story.en: A Great Wicked who defends Wicked Land. Although he originally commanded the Spiritswith Yulha, he eventually became a Wicked and joined the Great War. When the war ended, he felt remorse for his part in the war and renounced himself to defend Wicked Land and the seal as absolution. Although he may seem playful and jolly on the outside, his true emotions are full of agony.

description.en: Protector of the Wicked who defends the sealed land

Attacks the enemy with flames, --burning-- for 1 turn. When used on the caster's turn, has a 50% chance to use lncinerate instead of Scorching Flare.
lnclnerate: Attacks the enemy with an exploslon of flames and --burns-- for 1 turn, before **detonating** burn effects inflicted on the target at the end of the turn. This skill cannot trigger a Dual Attack.

soul_description.en: Has a 100% chance to use Incinerate.

description.en: ++Increases Attack++ and ++Defense++ by {{variable}}. When attacking, cannot trigger a critical hit. Increases burn damage suffered by enemies by 30%. This skill effect does not stack with other passive skills of the same name.
With light, **dispels two buffs** from all enemies and makes them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns, before **Increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%.

With light, **dispels two buffs** from all enemies and makes them --unable to be buffed-- for 2 turns, before **increasing Combat Readiness** of the caster by 50%. **Increases Combat Readiness** of all allies except for the caster by 20%.

get_line.en: Lead the way to a better tomorrow... That's what I must do.

description.en: A noble shaman who blooms hope
Attacks the enemy with a fan, and **increases Combat Readiness** of the caster by {{variable}}.

soul_description.en: Combat Readiness increase effect will be applied to all allies.

description.en: Grants ++skill nullifier++ once to all allies and **increases Combat Readiness** by {{variable}}. Grants an **extra turn** to the caster.
With Elven magic, **dispels two debuffs** from an ally except for the caster and grants ++Swiit Attack++.
With Elven magic, **dispels two debuffs** from an ally except for the caster and grants ++Swift Attack++. ++Increases Attack++ of the target for 2 turns.
